T02TD2688E:286b-12: sarba ta th'a ga t'a ku la bhu dze sa ma ya nishke pra sar tu /
T02TD2688E:286b-13: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ltar dam tshig la so sor rtog cing zhes te bkra shis kyi rdzas la sogs pa'am sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gang yang rung ba cig la dmigs pa'i gzhi'o //
T02TD2688E:286b-16: zhes pa bsod nams 'phel bar 'dod pas spyi bo'i steng du rin po che'i gdugs dkar po la sngags kyi phreng bas bskor la bzla'o //
T02TD2688E:286b-17: bi n'a sha drum p'a pam /
T02TD2688E:286b-18: zhes pas sdig pa bcom par 'dod pas rang gi mdzod spu'i nang du nor bu rin po che la sngags kyi phreng ba bkod de bzlas so //
T02TD2688E:286b-19: sarba ke la bi sha ha re zhes nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad 'phrog 'dod pas rang gi sna rtser dpal be'u'i ri mo sngon po bkod de bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2688E:286b-20: ma ni bi shud dhe sho dha ya bi ma le /
T02TD2688E:286b-21: yid rnam par dag cing byang nas dri ma dang bral bar 'dod na spyi bor zla ba'i steng du bum pa gang ba las chu rgyun byung bas lus tshim par gyur par bsams te brjod do //
T02TD2688E:286b-22: bi ka si ta padme k'a ya 'bag tsitta bhu dze shata p'a ra mi t'a pa ri p'u ra ni /
T02TD2688E:287a-0: zhes pas phyag na padma rgyas pa ltar lus ngag yid pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis gang bar 'dod @287a * //
T02TD2688E:287a-1: pas ni phyogs dus kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang bdag rgyang ring ba yang ma yin nye ba yang ma yin par dmigs te gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul du brjod do //
T02TD2688E:287a-2: da ni lha la dmigs pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rig pa'i lha mo dang khro bo thams cad kyang 'dir ni rig pa'i lha mo nyid du blta'o //
T02TD2688E:287a-3: de la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus na bcu bdun nyid du 'gyur bas 'dir yang lha bcu bdun kho na gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:287a-4: rang bzhin sems bcu bdun ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang /
T02TD2688E:287a-10: 'du byed de des na lha bcu bdun no //
T02TD2688E:287a-11: phyis ni rigs du ma nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:287a-12: lha de dag gi ming bshad pa /
T02TD2688E:287a-13: sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha bi lo ki te sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:287a-14: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par gzigs ma zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-15: sarba ta th'a ga t'a gu hya aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:287a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs ma zhes rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-18: tshe 'dzin ma spyan ma'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-20: bsod nams 'dzin ma m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-21: pu n+ya bi lo ki te sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:287a-22: bsod nams rnam par gzigs ma na bza' dkar mo'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-23: pu n+ya a'a ba lo ki te sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:287a-24: zhes pa bsod nams spyan ras gzigs ma ste sgrol ma'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-27: sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-29: gshin rje 'joms ma ste 'jam dpal gyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-31: gshin rje dbyug pa ma ste phyag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-33: shin tu rol ma ste byams pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-34: sam ba ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:287a-35: bde mchog ma ste spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-37: bde 'dzin ma ste nam mkha'i snying po'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287a-38: pra te sa ra ni sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:287a-40: kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287b-0: mdangs ldan ma ste sa'i @287b snying po'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287b-2: gzi brjid ldan ma ste rin chen 'byung gnas kyi ngo bo zla ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287b-4: rgyal ldan ma ste snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo nyi ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287b-5: sarba ta th'a ga t'a mu dra aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:287b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD2688E:287b-7: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:287b-8: de dag ni dmigs pa'i gzhi'i lha'o //
T02TD2688E:287b-9: de dag gi phrin las ni sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:287b-10: zhes pa thams cad kyis kyang bsreg pa dang /
T02TD2688E:287b-15: dang po ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i tshogs kyi nags tshal lo //
T02TD2688E:287b-16: gnyis pa ni las ngan pa sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2688E:287b-17: gsum pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o //
T02TD2688E:287b-18: bzhi pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2688E:287b-19: lnga pa ni ma rig pa'i bag la nyal thams cad do //
T02TD2688E:287b-20: da ni sngags la dmigs pa ni /
T02TD2688E:287b-21: aom na ma:stree ya dhve sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya zhes te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pas ming ngo //
T02TD2688E:287b-23: garbhe dzv'a la dzv'a la dharma dh'a tu garbhe sam ha ra /
T02TD2688E:287b-24: zhes snying po 'bar zhing 'bar bas chos kyi dbyings kyi snying por bskyod cig ces pas chos kyi sku mtshon te dam pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2688E:287b-25: de'i phrin las ni ma ma a'a yu: sam sho dha ya zhes skye ba 'dir bdag gi tshe dag par ro //
T02TD2688E:287b-26: ma ma sarba p'a pham skye ba du mar bdag gi sdig pa thams cad dag par ro //
T02TD2688E:287b-27: rgyu chos kyi sku de la 'tsham pa'i rkyen gsungs pa /
T02TD2688E:287b-28: sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha bi ma la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dri ma med pa zhes pas dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2688E:287b-29: de'i phrin las bi shud dhe zhes pa rnam par dag pa ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'o //
T02TD2688E:287b-31: zhes pa ni ye shes bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2688E:287b-32: aam bam sam dzam:zhes pa rigs bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2688E:287b-33: de dag ni brdar gyur pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2688E:287b-34: sngags de dag phyir 'brel pa ni brjod pa dang bcas pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2688E:287b-35: de'i phrin las ni lhag pa'i shes rab 'phel ba dang /
T02TD2688E:288a-0: bar du gcod pa dang bral ba ste @288a * //
T02TD2688E:288a-1: sv'ah'a zhes pa'i sgras grub bo //
T02TD2688E:288a-2: kun nas sgor 'jug pa la sogs pa ni spyir phan yon thun mong pa'o //
T02TD2688E:288a-3: de yang 'og nas rgyas par bshad do //
T02TD2688E:288a-4: lam gyi bye brag bshad pa la gnyis te /
T02TD2688E:288a-7: de nas lha'i dbang po la sogs pas lha'i 'jug pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD2688E:288a-8: byas ma thag la sogs pas nyams su blangs pa'i phan yon te pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi phan yon no //
T02TD2688E:288a-9: de nas lha'i bu la sogs pas ni rjes su yi rang ba'i bstod pa dang mchod pa'o //
T02TD2688E:288a-10: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pas ni sngon du gsungs pa'i las rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa de nyid do //
T02TD2688E:288a-11: zhus len gyi tshul gyis rgyas par te ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo las la yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2688E:288a-12: zhu ba po de dag gi nang nas lag na rdo rje la bos pa ni /
T02TD2688E:288a-13: lag na rdo rje 'di dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i mdzod 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD2688E:288a-14: dpal phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2688E:288a-15: dpal phyag na rdo rje ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku'i rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi sku bsrung ba po zhes te chos kyi sku ni byang chub sems dpa'i yul ma yin par bstan pa'i chos so //
T02TD2688E:288a-16: rgyal po yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa las ni dpal phyag na rdo rje ni theg pa thams cad kyi bdag por khas blangs par gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:288a-17: kun du bzang po dang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2688E:288a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs yang dag ba'i ye shes las byung bas tha mi dad par gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:288a-20: de nyid 'dus pa las kyang de kho na ltar gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:288a-21: de'i phyir bstan pa'i bdag po yin pas so //
T02TD2688E:288a-22: de'i tshe de'i dus na la sogs pas ni las rgyu 'bras tha dad du mi 'gyur bar gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:288a-23: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD2688E:288a-24: lus can rnams kyi las rnams ni //
T02TD2688E:288a-25: bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za //
T02TD2688E:288a-26: tshogs shin dus la bab pa na //
T02TD2688E:288a-28: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:288b-0: sdom pa gsum gyis bsdams zhes pa ni lha dang mi thun mong du gsungs te rgya che ba dang gting dpag dka' ba'i @288b theg pa gsum mi nyams pa'i tshul gyis bslab bya gang yang mi spong bas rim pa bzhin bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-1: de nas lha'i 'khor la sogs pas ni byin gyi rlabs kyi khyad par la ched du brjod pa'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-2: phyir mi ldog pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-3: da ni mi rnams kyi 'jug pa'i tshul zhus pa dang lan gyi tshul gyis gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:288b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa che ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa yin te /
T02TD2688E:288b-5: rgyal po zhes pas ni sngags 'di rgyal ba'i sras thams cad kyi 'byung khungs yin pas gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:288b-6: mthu chen po ni spangs bya thams cad spong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2688E:288b-7: phan yon che ba ni thob bya thams cad thob pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2688E:288b-8: de dag gis ni thar pa thob pa'i thabs zhus pa'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-9: phan pa ni nad dang gnod pa bsal ba'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-10: bde ba ni tshe dang longs spyod do //
T02TD2688E:288b-11: dmyal ba dang dud 'gro ni spang bya spong ba'i khyad par ro //
T02TD2688E:288b-12: de dag gis ni mtho ris thob pa'i thabs zhus so //
T02TD2688E:288b-14: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa ni nyan par gdams pa'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-15: bshad pa'i don mdor bstan pa la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ni mantra'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-16: ring bsrel gyi snying po ni tanta'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-18: de nas gang+g'a la sogs pas las sbyor thams cad phan yon gyi tshul du mdor bstan pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni mandala zlum po byas nas sku gdung ngam ring bsrel bzhugs te gnas bdun du bsgrub bya'i ming tsam bcug nas brjod pa ste /
T02TD2688E:288b-19: gzhan sngags kyi sbyor ba med pa'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-20: bsod nams 'phel ba ni dkyil 'khor dpal be'u lta bur byas nas ma ma pushtim ku ru zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2688E:288b-21: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sbyang ba la ni dkyil 'khor mche ba lta bu byas nas sarba p'a pam raksha ku ru zhes spel lo //
T02TD2688E:288b-22: dan song gsum gyi 'jigs pa bsal ba la ni dkyil 'khor padma rgyas pa lta bu byas nas sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ya zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:288b-23: tshe ring bar 'dod na dkyil 'khor nor bu rin po che lta bur byas te ma ma a'a yusth'a na ku ru zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2688E:288b-24: bde ba can du skye bar 'dod na dkyil 'khor gdugs kyi rnam pa ltar byas te /
T02TD2688E:288b-25: ma ma su lo ka pra ba ta ku ru zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2688E:289a-1: bslang ba'i dkyil 'khor bum pa lta bu byas te me pu tro bha banpu zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2688E:289a-2: shi ba la phan gdags pa yang rdzus te skye ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor padma can du bya'o //
T02TD2688E:289a-3: dran pa nyams pa gso ba la dkyil 'khor zla ba rgyas pa ltar byas nas dur sa t+ya aa pa na ya zhes sbyar ro//
T02TD2688E:289a-4: 'jigs pa bsal bar 'dod na ma ma aa bha yam ka ri zhes sbyar zhing dkyil 'khor mchod rten lta bu bya'o //
T02TD2688E:289a-5: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs 'phral gyi rkyen dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2688E:289a-6: rmi lam ngan pa la dur sva pni aa pa na ya dang /
T02TD2688E:289a-7: ltas ngan pa la ni du rmi tam aa pa na ya zhes pa dang /
T02TD2688E:289a-8: a'a k'a la mri tyu pra sha ma na zhes dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog pa dang /
T02TD2688E:289a-9: tsitta by'a ku la ni sems g-yeng ba'o //
T02TD2688E:289a-10: dzva ra sam by'a dhi aa pa na ya na da sol cig pa la sogs pa sbyor ba dang bcas pa brjod cing dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas nas 'dod pa'i las de dag grub bo //
T02TD2688E:289a-11: da ni cho ga'i tshul brjod de /
T02TD2688E:289a-12: khrus byas la zhes pa la sogs pa cho ga la 'jug pa'i snga rol du chu gtsang ma'am sman dang sbyar ba'i chu la sngags thung ba brjod cing gdong la sogs pa bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:289a-13: de'i dus su rig pa'i lha mo spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams kyi sngags kyi phreng ba brjod cing bdag la khrus byed par yang bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:289a-14: gzungs kyis nying po 'di nyid dam rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sngags la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gos sar pa gyon par bya ba'am /
T02TD2688E:289a-15: aom aa mi ka pa ri shuddhe sho dha ya sa ma te na dhi ri dhi ri /
T02TD2688E:289a-18: ba'i rnam lnga la stong bzlas te gos dang snod spyad dang zas kyi rgyu la gtor gnas khang la chag chag gdab bo //
T02TD2688E:289a-19: bza' nyes dang bgo nyes la sogs pa kun sel to //
T02TD2688E:289a-20: yang tsandan dang gla ba'i chu la sogs pa la aom shr'i ma h'a k'a ru na padma aa mo gha aa mo gha aa pra ti ha ra badzra aa dhishth'a na bhu ru bha nam dha ri sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:289a-21: zhes pas gnas khang la sogs pa dang phyogs thams cad dri zhim por bya'o //
T02TD2688E:289a-22: spos kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya zhes bya ba ni aom badzra bh'u mi h'um zhes brko ba'am /
T02TD2688E:289a-23: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas sa brko ba dang /
T02TD2688E:289a-24: aom badzr'a sa n'a ya h'um chu blangs nas /
T02TD2688E:289b-0: aom badzra go ma ye h'um zhes gci ba @289b dang bsres nas 'jim pa bya ba dang dkyil 'khor 'dom gang pa la sogs pa ci 'dad par brtsigs nas aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pas ba'i rnam lnga tsandan gyi chu dang bsregs nas g-yas skor du byug go //
T02TD2688E:289b-1: aom su re khe sarba da th'a ga t'a aa dhishthantu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:289b-2: zhes lag pa'i rgyab tu me tog bzhag la aom sarba bighnam autsh'a ra ya h'um zhes mandala gyi dbus su der nas /
T02TD2688E:289b-3: aom sarba su bi shuddha dharm'a n'am sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:289b-6: zhes me tog de spyi bor bzhag go //
T02TD2688E:289b-7: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas thig gang 'dod pa'i tshul du gdab bo //
T02TD2688E:289b-8: tshon sna ma lus pas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:289b-10: aom aam bam sam dzam h'um zhes pa dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag po dang sngon po rnams rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang mi bskyod par bsams nas ye shes kyi lha dang gnyis su med par byas nas mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas snying po 'ba' zhig brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do //
T02TD2688E:289b-11: yang de dag dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang ral gri dang rdo rje dag gi phyag rgyar gyur par mos la rin po che'i phyag rgya de dag gi rtsig par bsam zhing bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2688E:289b-12: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sngags brjod cing dbang ldan nas g-yas skor du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:289b-13: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su ba dan nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha dog tha dad bri'o //
T02TD2688E:289b-16: g-yer kha'i phreng ba dang srad bu'i ra ba dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang sil snyan dang mda' yab dang ral gri dang me long dang rma bya'i sgro'i chun po sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:289b-17: snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o zhes pa la /
T02TD2688E:289b-18: gzungs sngags yi ge'i tshul du bri ba ni //
T02TD2688E:289b-19: ras sam shing shun gro ga'am //
T02TD2688E:289b-20: t'a la'i lo ma sar pa'am //
T02TD2688E:289b-21: gur gum gi wang gla rtsi la //
T02TD2688E:289b-23: gser gyi sdong po sar pa yis //
T02TD2688E:289b-24: gzungs sngags phreng ba ma nyams pa //
T02TD2688E:289b-25: skar ma mgo rgyal lha mtshams la //
T02TD2688E:289b-26: shar du bltas nas bris par bya //
T02TD2688E:290a-1: gyis lag pa g-yas pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal du bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290a-2: g-yon pa ni kun du bzang por bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290a-3: bri gzhi ni phyogs bcu'i zhing khams su bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290a-4: smyu gu ni phyag na rdo rjer bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290a-5: snag tsha ni yi ge aa'i rnam par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290a-6: bri ba'i dus su 'jam dpal dang kun du bzang pos drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don gyi chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad par gsungs pa de phyag na rdo rjes phyogs bcu'i zhing thams cad du yi ge'i tshul du sgrogs shing bkram pas skad tha dad yi ge'i dbyibs dang kha dog tha dad du snang bar mos te shar ram byang du bltas pas dus tshod bzang po la lhag pa'i bsam pa ma 'khrugs pas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:290a-7: 'dod chags kyi sems dang bcas pas ma yin no //
T02TD2688E:290a-8: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang nga rgyal dang phrag dog dang ser sna dang rgyags pa dang bag med pa dang rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa dang lta ba ngan pa dang bcas pas ma yin no //
T02TD2688E:290a-9: de ni yi ge'i tshul lo //
T02TD2688E:290a-10: yang na rin po che'am rdo'am rva'am shing gi khams las yi ge phreng ba khol du brkos nas sa 'jam po'i 'jim pa shin tu legs pa la sprad de ji tsam 'dod pa'i grangs su byed pa 'di sku phyag rgya'i tshul du bkod pa'o ;
T02TD2688E:290a-11: / yang na rdo ba'am rin po che la sogs pa la thub pa'i sku'i mtha' skor du sngags kyi phreng ba zlum po'i tshul du bkod de khol du brkos nas 'jim pa dang sprod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:290a-12: de'i grangs ji tsam 'dod pa byas pa ni sku'i tshul du'o //
T02TD2688E:290a-13: sngags de dag gos dmar pos dkris te mgo'i phyogs gsal bar bya ste sa phyogs gtsang mar gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:290a-14: de ni yi ge bri ba'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2688E:290a-15: mchod rten lnga gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa lnga'am dgu'am lnga'am gcig la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2688E:290a-16: de la s'atstsha'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2688E:290a-17: skyon bral rab tu 'jam pa'i sa ;
T02TD2688E:290a-18: / dri bzangs chu yis 'jim pa la //
T02TD2688E:290a-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten no //
T02TD2688E:290b-0: zhes pa'i tshul gyis gyo mo dang sol ba dang rdo dang gseg ma dang rtsva la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral ba bkra shis pa'i phyogs nas blangs te tsandan la @290b sogs pa dri zhim po'i chus blangs te legs par brdung zhing 'thas pa dang 'dres par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:290b-2: aom na ma:sarba buddha aa dhishthi te bh'u mi raksha raksha h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:290b-4: lag pa'i sor mo sa la reg nas //
T02TD2688E:290b-5: aom na ma:sa manta bud dh'a n'am sarba aa dhishth'a na ratna bh'u mi ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:290b-6: zhes rin po che'i sa gzhir bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290b-7: aom a'a:badzra kha na kha na h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:290b-8: zhes brko zhing brkos pa thams cad yi ge aa'i ngo bor bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290b-9: aom na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo //
T02TD2688E:290b-10: aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te /
T02TD2688E:290b-11: aa ma la bi ma la ni rma le bi shuddha sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:290b-12: zhes byang chub sems kyi chu tsandan la sogs pa dri zhim pos bran no //
T02TD2688E:290b-13: aom na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi sa tve bhya: aa dhithth'a na aa dhiththi te /
T02TD2688E:290b-14: sarba satva bi kalpa ha na ha na h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:290b-15: zhes rdo rje dbyug pas brdung zhing bsre bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:290b-16: aom na ma: sa manta du bdh'a n'am /
T02TD2688E:290b-17: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a ma badzra a'a: yu shi sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:290b-18: zhes 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig tu byas nas /
T02TD2688E:290b-19: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02TD2688E:290b-20: aom badzra pra mardha na ya sarba pra mardha na ya h'um phat ces brjod pas 'jim pa'i gong bu de nyid tr'am las rin po che'i ri bor gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290b-21: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am /
T02TD2688E:290b-22: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo //
T02TD2688E:290b-24: aom sukshme sukshma ya nu ga ta /
T02TD2688E:290b-26: ya sha ya sho ba ti te jo ba ti /
T02TD2688E:290b-27: sarba buddha aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te h'um phat /
T02TD2688E:290b-28: 'di ni sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rgyud las sngags 'di bye ma'am 'jim pa'i gong bu la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas s'atstsha byas nas mchod rten de'i rdul phra rab re re la'ang mchod rten re rer 'gyur la rdul phra rab de nyid kyi grangs tsam gyi lha dang mi'i go 'phang thob bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:290b-29: gang du skyes pa de'i skye ba yang dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:290b-30: myur du sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa'i sku thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:290b-31: zhes te 'jim pa'i gong bu de nyid padma dang zla ba'i stang du aom las rnam par snang mdzad gang chen / mtsho ri rab bye ba'i tshad kyi sku ba spu'i gseb thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phyogs kyi rigs kyi skus gang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:290b-32: aom badzra bhe b'a dha ye sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-1: pa'i tshe rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i ba spu'i gseb nas sku re re spyan drang par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:291a-2: aom ratno bha bante h'um zhes 'bi 'bi byas la sku rin po che'i na bza' lcib mas blangs par bsam zhing /
T02TD2688E:291a-3: aom dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-4: zhes snying po bcug pas thugs bskyed par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:291a-5: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze sv'a h'a //
T02TD2688E:291a-6: zhes mar gyi snum gyis byug pa ni /
T02TD2688E:291a-7: lha'i tshegs kyis dri'i char phab par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:291a-8: aom badzra bhe dhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-10: aom dha rm'a ta ro dbha be ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-11: zhes bskol phor du bcug pa'i tshe chos 'byung du zhugs par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:291a-12: aom badzra mung+ gar a'a ko ta h'um phat ces brdung ba'i tshe ming gi yi ge phreng ba du ma dang bcas par bsam zhing sprul pa du ma'i steng du gyur par bsam la /
T02TD2688E:291a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sambho ga k'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-14: zhes bskol phor nas drangs pa'i tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bsam /
T02TD2688E:291a-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a ni rma na k'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-16: phyung ma thag tu sprul pa'i skur bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:291a-17: aom dha rma ratno ratna sam bha be sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-18: zhes pas sku de ba sbu'i gseb thams cad skus gang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:291a-19: de yang sku re re pho brang ye shes kyi snying po can mthong na dga' ba'i mchod rten du bzhugs par bsams nas //
T02TD2688E:291a-20: aom a'a: yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-22: aom pra mardha na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-24: aom pa tam k'a lam ba sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-26: / aom sa ra ra ta sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-27: zhes pas ba dan dbul lo //
T02TD2688E:291a-28: aom dum bi ra dum bam sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-29: zhes chu srin rgyal mtshan dbul lo //
T02TD2688E:291a-30: aom pra ma na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-32: aom ratna m'a la tr'm zhes pas phreng ba gdags la /
T02TD2688E:291a-33: aom na ma she ya da bug dha pra ti sha ga ta ti bhe ;
T02TD2688E:291a-34: ta th'a ga to aarha te bhya: samyaksam buddha ya /
T02TD2688E:291a-36: aom su su ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-38: aom dha rmm'a da mi le dza le sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:291a-40: aom badzra dh'a tu aadhiksha dhe h'um zhes brten par gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD2688E:291b-0: de'i 'og tu rten 'brel gyi sngags brjod @291b dri bzang po'i chus bsangs te me tog la sogs pas rgyas par mchod do //
T02TD2688E:291b-1: de nas gzungs gang du bzhugs pa de brjod cing bskor ba gsum ma ma nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-3: bum pa gang ba lnga gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:291b-4: zhes bya ba yang mtshon pa ste bum pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'am bcu'am drug gam yang na gcig go //
T02TD2688E:291b-6: gser dngul zangs sam shing dag gam //
T02TD2688E:291b-7: sa rdo las byas lto ba che //
T02TD2688E:291b-8: zhabs phra ske ring mchu 'phyang ba //
T02TD2688E:291b-9: gser ram bkrus pa'i bum pa ni //
T02TD2688E:291b-10: lha yi grangs sam rigs bdag gi //
T02TD2688E:291b-11: tshad rnams ci 'byor bkod par bya //
T02TD2688E:291b-12: yid 'ong gtsang ma'i chus bkang nas //
T02TD2688E:291b-13: byi ru gser dngul mu tig dang //
T02TD2688E:291b-14: nor bu rma med rin chen lnga //
T02TD2688E:291b-15: seng gri by'a gri gir ka rni //
T02TD2688E:291b-16: pa to ha sa de ba sman //
T02TD2688E:291b-17: gro nas 'bras kyi so ba til //
T02TD2688E:291b-19: tsandan ga pur gur gum dang //
T02TD2688E:291b-20: dz'a ti aa ka ru dri lnga //
T02TD2688E:291b-21: lan tshva bu ram sbrang dang mar //
T02TD2688E:291b-22: brag zhun 'byung ba'i snying po lnga //
T02TD2688E:291b-23: bum pa bzang po'i gter yin te //
T02TD2688E:291b-24: mi nyams gos dang lo mas ni //
T02TD2688E:291b-25: mgrin pa dang ni dbu rgyan bya //
T02TD2688E:291b-28: zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rtog par gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:291b-29: de la thugs rje chen po'i brlan gyi phyir chu dang ba'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-30: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon sogs pa'i phyir 'bru lnga'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-31: chos kyi sku'i gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir rin po che lnga'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-32: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir sman lnga'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-33: gdul bya byang chub kyi lam gyi bsrung ba bskyed pa'i phyir dri lnga'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-34: 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du gzugs kyi sku rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i snying po lnga'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-35: chos kyi gsung la nyams pa med pa'i phyir mgrin pa gos bzang gis bcing ba'o //
T02TD2688E:291b-36: 'gro ba'i bsam pa yid bzhin du skong ba'i phyir kha rgyan no //
T02TD2688E:292a-0: lam ngan pa dman pa'i gang zag gis rtogs dka' ba dang dbang po rnon po la rgya che ba dang chos nyid zab mo rtogs par rigs pa'i spyod yul @292a * //
T02TD2688E:292a-1: ma yin pa dang rtogs na phyi nang gnyis su med pa'i rtags su bum pa zhabs phra zhing lho che ba dang ske ba phra ba dang mchu 'phyang ba'o //
T02TD2688E:292a-2: gal te bum pa lnga la sogs pa yin na rigs kyi phyag rgya yang dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:292a-3: bum pa de dag la yang rma bya'i gdugs dang cod pan dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis spras te bkod do //
T02TD2688E:292a-4: gra bzhir po ga phor bzhi zhes pa yang ma chag pa dang ma gas pa'i snod du tu rus ni byang shar du bsreg go aa ga ru ni shar lhor ro //
T02TD2688E:292a-6: gu gul ni nub byang du'o//
T02TD2688E:292a-7: snod bzhi ni mtshon pa tsam ste spos dang me tog tha dad pa dang yon chab dang mar me dang byug pa dang zhal zas dang sku gdung gi grangs dang sbyar nas dgod do //
T02TD2688E:292a-8: de yang cho ga rgyas pa dang bsdus pa kun mtshon par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:292a-9: de re zhig s'atstsha brgya pa'i dbang du byas na rang nyid lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas thams cad du sngon gyi nyin par skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas sdom pa bzung ste mandala phul nas mchod de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la dmigs te dbang por byas nas tshigs bcad 'dis gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD2688E:292a-11: rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs //
T02TD2688E:292a-12: padma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs //
T02TD2688E:292a-13: bde gshegs rigs tshogs ma lus pa 'am //
T02TD2688E:292a-14: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2688E:292a-15: nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can //
T02TD2688E:292a-16: brjod mi lang sogs tshogs bcad dang //
T02TD2688E:292a-17: ded dpon 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs //
T02TD2688E:292a-18: kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2688E:292a-19: bdag kyang yongs su dag pa dang //
T02TD2688E:292a-20: 'gro ba nyon mongs gnas bsgral phyir //
T02TD2688E:292a-21: cho ga bzang po 'di'i sgo nas //
T02TD2688E:292a-22: yid bzhin nor 'dra sgrub byed na//
T02TD2688E:292a-23: bdag la yongs su bskyab pa dang //
T02TD2688E:292a-24: sems can rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir //
T02TD2688E:292a-25: ye shes can gyi gzigs nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:292a-26: nye bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02TD2688E:292b-0: sv'a h'a zhes lan gsum la sogs pa brjod de shar phyogs su kha bltas te gzungs nyi shu rtsa @292b gcig brjod la nyal lo //
T02TD2688E:292b-1: gal te rmi lam dang ltas ngan na rigs pa'i khro bo gang yang rung ba'i sngags mang du brjod de gtor ma dang mchod pa dbul zhing tshim par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:292b-2: lhag par yang yi dags la gtor ma mang du sbyin no //
T02TD2688E:292b-3: de ni cho ga thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba dang po'o //
T02TD2688E:292b-4: de nas s'atstsha brgya pa'i dbang du byas na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa dbus kyi pho brang re mig brgya par byas te de yang le tshe'am padma'i khor yug gam sku gdung mchod rten bzhi bsdus pa'i gzugs su byas la cho ga dang ldan pa'i s'atstsha re re rgyan dang bcas pa le tshe re re la me tog steng du gzhag sgo'i nang rol du zung re gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:292b-5: lha snam gyi zur bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:292b-6: shar du dkyil 'khor khru gang ba bdun gyi steng du sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa khri'u'i steng du gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:292b-7: de'i drung du bum pa gang ba cho ga dang bcas pa gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:292b-8: me tog ge snod dang spos snod dang byug pa dang mar me dang zhal zas rnams re re la'ang brgya rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas bskor ro //
T02TD2688E:292b-9: dgu pa'am lnga pa la sogs pa la ni rdo rje rgya gram mam padma bris te gzhal yas khang yod dam med kyang rung ngo //
T02TD2688E:292b-10: bum pa dang s'atstsha dang sku gdung thams cad kyang nang du tshud par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:292b-11: shar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag go //
T02TD2688E:292b-12: lhor stobs po che bklag go //
T02TD2688E:292b-13: nub du rma bya chen mo'o //
T02TD2688E:292b-14: byang du mdo sde'i dbang po gser 'od dam pa'i mdo bklag go //
T02TD2688E:292b-15: shar phyogs su 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2688E:292b-16: lho phyogs nas dad pa ldan pas ma mo rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2688E:292b-17: nub phyogs nas klu la sbyin no //
T02TD2688E:292b-18: byang phyogs nas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2688E:292b-19: de la smon lam gsol ba'i tshigs su gcad pa ni 'di dag yin te /
T02TD2688E:292b-20: shar phyogs su snying po'i sngags dang bcas ba brjod de /
T02TD2688E:292b-21: tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che //
T02TD2688E:292b-22: khyab 'jug lha klu gnod sbyin sogs /
T02TD2688E:292b-23: ded dpon brgyad po 'khor bcas dang //
T02TD2688E:292b-24: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas rnams dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-2: bdag gis khrus dang me tog dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-3: spos dang mar me byug pa dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-4: zhal zas tshogs rnams khyed la 'bul //
T02TD2688E:293a-5: khyed kyi dpal dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-6: gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis ni //
T02TD2688E:293a-7: nad dang gnod pa bsal nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:293a-8: che ge'am bdag la bkra shis mdzod //
T02TD2688E:293a-9: shar phyogs su sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:293a-10: lho phyogs su yang de bzhin du brjod de /
T02TD2688E:293a-11: de bzhin du nub dang byang du'ang brjod do //
T02TD2688E:293a-12: de dag ni sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2688E:293a-13: de nas bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa po rnams gos sar pa gyon cing khrus byas nas kha byang du bltas te yungs kar dang nas la sogs pa'i 'bru sna tshogs kyis bdag gi lag pa g-yon pas bskor zhing kham phor gyi tsandan me'i nang du dor ro //
T02TD2688E:293a-14: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod la kham phor sgor bskur ro //
T02TD2688E:293a-15: gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas //
T02TD2688E:293a-16: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-17: tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che //
T02TD2688E:293a-18: khyab 'jug dbang phyug klu dbang po //
T02TD2688E:293a-19: gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams //
T02TD2688E:293a-20: rang rang 'khor dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-21: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang ;
T02TD2688E:293a-22: / gzhan yang 'byung po mthu chen rnams //
T02TD2688E:293a-23: de dag kun gyi mthu dang dpal //
T02TD2688E:293a-24: brtson 'grus gzi brjid byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2688E:293a-25: ro langs la sogs gdon rnams kyis //
T02TD2688E:293a-26: nad dang gnod pa chad 'gyur cig / rdo rjes rin chen phug pa dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-27: me yis bud shing sreg byed dang ;
T02TD2688E:293a-28: / rlung gis sprin rnams 'thor ba dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-29: nyi mas 'dam sogs skems pa dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-30: seng ges ri dags kun skrag ltar //
T02TD2688E:293a-31: sngags dang phyag rgya bden pa'i mthus //
T02TD2688E:293a-32: ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD2688E:293a-33: byad stems thams cad tshig par shog / de nas sgrub pa po dang bsgrub bya thams cad kyi mgo la me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02TD2688E:293a-34: lus dri zhim pos byug par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:293a-35: de dag ni sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga gsum pa'o //
T02TD2688E:293a-36: yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2688E:293b-0: snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil @293b 'khor la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gnyis dus gcig tu dran par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:293b-1: zhes pa la sogs pa tshig gsum dang 'brel te dran par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:293b-2: zhes pa'i don 'di ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:293b-3: s'atstsha ni thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas kyi sku kho nar bsams te /
T02TD2688E:293b-4: s'atstsha re re la yang rnam par snang mdzad re rer bsams la de'i ba spu'i gseb thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis gang ba'o //
T02TD2688E:293b-5: de nas s'atstsha'i grangs kyi rnam par snang mdzad bye ba brgya phrag go //
T02TD2688E:293b-6: de la 'dir gzungs yi ge'i tshul du klog na bum pa ni aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsams nas de'i steng du aa las gzungs kyi phreng ba dkar pos bskor ba'am yang na phyogs bzhir aam bam sam dza: zhes dmigs te g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon spangs nas gzungs ring thung gnyis spel ba brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do //
T02TD2688E:293b-7: de'i tshe sngags dang zla ba'i 'od kyis ye shes kyi 'od zer dang 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams cad bsdus nas zla ba dang yi ge thams cad la thim par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:293b-8: de nas gzungs thung 'ba' zhig gdon zhing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02TD2688E:293b-9: de'i tshe sngags dang yi ge'i 'od kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dag par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:293b-10: de nas yi ge dang sngags bdud rtsir zhu bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:293b-11: bskor ba'i dus su ni sku gdung gi lha'i grangs brjod kyis mi lang ba bum pa'i nang du yi ge'am phyag rgya'am lha gcig bu'i sku'i 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang nang sbyang ba dang dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:293b-12: nad kyis btab pa la sogs pa brgyad po ni gong gi las sbyor gyi bye brag ste sngon du bshad pa'i sngags kyi sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i chus bkru zhing dbang po'i sgo lnga rma bya'i sgros bya ba pa'o //
T02TD2688E:293b-13: de yang khrus bya ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te bum pa bdud rtsi'i chur bsams te /
T02TD2688E:293b-14: rol mo sil snyan du mar bcas //
T02TD2688E:293b-16: nyams dga'i tshul du gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2688E:294a-0: aom byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas @294a * //
T02TD2688E:294a-2: / mchog chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02TD2688E:294a-3: bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD2688E:294a-4: sngags kyi chu yis byin brlab stsol //
T02TD2688E:294a-5: gsum brjod phyag 'tshal bskor ba bya //
T02TD2688E:294a-7: bsrung la ras sogs kha dog dkar //
T02TD2688E:294a-8: tshe bsring sogs la ser mo'i rdzas //
T02TD2688E:294a-9: shi ba slu ba dur smrig mdog / bu slong sogs la dmar po ste //
T02TD2688E:294a-10: gnod pa bzlog pa sngon pos bya //
T02TD2688E:294a-11: las kun la ni ljang gu shis //
T02TD2688E:294a-12: ser sna med par yon phul nas //
T02TD2688E:294a-13: blo ldan slob dpon phyag gis ni //
T02TD2688E:294a-14: yal gas bum pa blang bar bya //
T02TD2688E:294a-15: 'gro na lhag pa'i sems btang nas //
T02TD2688E:294a-16: 'gying dang bcas pas khrus gsol lo //
T02TD2688E:294a-17: zhes pa'i tshul gyis dang por bkra shis brjod cing smon lam du yang bsngos nas bden pa'i byin rlabs 'di brjod do //
T02TD2688E:294a-18: ston mchog dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa //
T02TD2688E:294a-19: sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal ded 'dir bde legs shog / zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa //
T02TD2688E:294a-20: chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog / tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa //
T02TD2688E:294a-21: dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog /'jig rten 'di'am yang na 'das pa yi //
T02TD2688E:294a-22: mtho ris dag la rin chen mchog yod pa //
T02TD2688E:294a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur te //
T02TD2688E:294a-24: mi mchog 'di dang gang yang mtshungs pa med //
T02TD2688E:294a-25: de phyir sangs rgyas rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294a-26: bden pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog / zag pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas //
T02TD2688E:294a-27: mkhyen ldan sh'akya thub kyis ni rab dbye mdzad //
T02TD2688E:294a-28: 'chi med dam chos zhi ba 'du byed bral //
T02TD2688E:294a-29: chos 'di dag dang mtshungs pa gang yang med //
T02TD2688E:294a-30: de phyir dam chos rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294a-31: bden pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog / gang 'dod de la tshul bzhin mchog ston pa //
T02TD2688E:294a-32: ston pa bla med rtag bsgrub rnal 'byor gzhi //
T02TD2688E:294a-33: rdo rje lta bu gnyis med lam gsal bas //
T02TD2688E:294a-34: ting 'dzin 'di dang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang med //
T02TD2688E:294a-35: de phyir dam chos rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294a-36: bden pa de yis deng 'dir bde legs shog / gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing /
T02TD2688E:294a-37: gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa 'di dag ni //
T02TD2688E:294b-0: drang @294b srong chen po gang zag mtshungs pa med //
T02TD2688E:294b-1: bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294b-2: de phyir dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294b-3: bden pa de yis deng 'dir bde legs shog / gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing //
T02TD2688E:294b-4: goo ta ma'i bstan la rab zhugs nas //
T02TD2688E:294b-5: dam chos thos mang bdud rtsi ma chag rnyed de //
T02TD2688E:294b-6: mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa //
T02TD2688E:294b-7: de phyir dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294b-8: bden pa de yis deng 'dir bde legs shog lus sam ngag gam de bzhin yid kyis kyang //
T02TD2688E:294b-9: 'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang //
T02TD2688E:294b-10: the tshom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag / cig car spangs te 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong //
T02TD2688E:294b-11: de phyir dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294b-12: bden pa de yis deng 'dir bde legs shog / lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang ;
T02TD2688E:294b-13: / sdig pa rnam bcu nam yang mi byed la //
T02TD2688E:294b-14: glo bur byas kyang mi 'chab myur du bshags //
T02TD2688E:294b-15: de ltar log lta de dag 'dzin mi byed //
T02TD2688E:294b-16: de phyir dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294b-17: bden pa de yis deng 'dir bde legs shog / ci ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa ;
T02TD2688E:294b-18: / phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi bskyod ltar //
T02TD2688E:294b-19: 'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa 'thob pa yis //
T02TD2688E:294b-20: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam rtog gis mi g-yo //
T02TD2688E:294b-21: de phyir dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294b-22: bden pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog / shes rab shin tu zab cing brtan pa yis //
T02TD2688E:294b-23: 'phags pa'i bden rnams yang dag rab bsgoms nas //
T02TD2688E:294b-24: lus kyi sbyin pa yid la byas pas ni //
T02TD2688E:294b-25: de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:294b-26: de phyir dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:294b-27: bden pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /
T02TD2688E:294b-28: ji ltar rlung gis me ni rab gtor na //
T02TD2688E:294b-29: lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa ltar //
T02TD2688E:294b-30: sangs rgyas sras rnams kun du sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2688E:294b-31: rab sngags 'jig tshogs bstan du med par 'gro //
T02TD2688E:294b-32: de phyir dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2688E:295a-0: bden pa des ni ding 'dir bde legs shog / bla ma @295a * //
T02TD2688E:295a-1: mkhan po pha ma grogs po dang //
T02TD2688E:295a-2: yon bdag gnyen bshes chos kyi rgyal po dang //
T02TD2688E:295a-3: sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba //
T02TD2688E:295a-4: de dag thams cad deng 'dir bde legs shog / ces brjod nas bum pa'i chu las nyungs zad blangs te mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bsams la yon chab kyi tshul du mchod do //
T02TD2688E:295a-5: aom na ma:sarba bu ddha bo dhi satve bhya: sam sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:295a-6: de bzhin du 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2688E:295a-7: aom na ma:sarba aa ham shra ba ka bhye k'a ya w'a gtsitta sam shodha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:295a-8: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:295a-9: bdud rtsi ye shes chu bor ni //
T02TD2688E:295a-10: bden pa'i mthu yis byin brlabs pa //
T02TD2688E:295a-11: rnam dag sngags kyi chu rgyun gyis //
T02TD2688E:295a-12: 'jig rten bag chags dag gyur cig / aom sarba sa di ba lo ka phri tha ka sam sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:295a-14: de nas gang zhig khrus bya ba de gos dang rgyan sar pas brgyan te //
T02TD2688E:295a-15: sdig pa bshags pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2688E:295a-16: sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa 'dzin du bcug la khrus byas nas me tog phreng ba mgo la gdags so //
T02TD2688E:295a-17: de bzhin du dang por gzungs 'di gnyis brjod de rma bya'i sgro'am ku sh'i chun bos nad dam sdig pa la sogs pa bya ba lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295a-18: de'i 'og tu spyan ma la sogs pa rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'i sngags kyis mgo nas khrus bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295a-19: de nas rig pa'i lha mo gzhan thams cad dang /
T02TD2688E:295a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sngags gang dag brjod nus pas yan lag thams cad khrus bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295a-21: de la 'di yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295a-22: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyi tshe //
T02TD2688E:295a-23: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD2688E:295a-24: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2688E:295a-25: de ring 'dir yang sku khrus gsol //
T02TD2688E:295a-26: de ma thag phyag 'tshal nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295a-27: de'i lhag mar gyur pa'i bum pa'i chus phyugs lhas dang /
T02TD2688E:295a-28: rta dang glang po'i bres dang /
T02TD2688E:295a-29: zhing dang gtsug lag khang dang /
T02TD2688E:295a-30: mkhar dang khyim dang ra ba dang /
T02TD2688E:295a-31: lam srang la sogs pa thams cad du gtor ro //
T02TD2688E:295b-0: s'atstsha dang sku gdung @295b la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2688E:295b-1: dben pa'i sa phyogs su bzhugs so //
T02TD2688E:295b-2: rdul tshon ni ci bde bar dor ro //
T02TD2688E:295b-3: bum pa'i yo byad dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa thams cad ni /
T02TD2688E:295b-4: gang rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas dge ba'i ched du longs spyod kyi tha mal par ni 'gal tshabs che'o ;
T02TD2688E:295b-5: / zhes kyi lhag mas ni yi dgas la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2688E:295b-6: de'i rjes su ni kun du bzang po'i smon lam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na g-yeng ba med par bklag go //
T02TD2688E:295b-7: de dag gis ni gzungs yi ge'i tshul du bklag pa dang po ste /
T02TD2688E:295b-8: gzhan la rgya cher skabs 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295b-10: 'di lta bu bum pa dang padma dang zla ba'i steng du aa yig dkar po de'i steng du nyi ma la aam yig de gnyis char h'um bzhis bskor te /
T02TD2688E:295b-11: re re la so sor sngags phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa 'khor bar bsams la de'i 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi sngags thams cad bkug cing de nyid du thim par bsams te bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295b-12: bskor ba'i dus su yi ge dang sngags kyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi 'od zer dang 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams cad der thim zhing /
T02TD2688E:295b-13: de'i 'od zer gyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi nad dang 'tshe ba thams cad sel bar bsams la bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295b-14: lhag ma ni sngon ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295b-16: bum pa padma dkar po'i steng du zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyar ba'i bar du aa dang aam las phyogs bzhir h'um bzhi dang mtshams su aam bam sam dzam:bskor te de la yang so sor sngags kyis bskor bar bsams la /
T02TD2688E:295b-17: sngags brjod pas yi ge dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis rang bzhin gyi sngags bkug cing der thim pa dang /
T02TD2688E:295b-18: bskor ba'i dus su ye shes kyi 'od zer dang 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi bsdus nas der thim ste /
T02TD2688E:295b-19: 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang /
T02TD2688E:295b-20: sdig pa thams cad zad par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:295b-21: lhag ma cho ga sngon ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:295b-22: da ni gzungs phyag rgya la dmigs nas bklag pa ni /
T02TD2688E:296a-0: bum pa padma dang zla ba'i steng du aa las skyes pa rin po che cha gcig pa aa yig dkar po @296a * //
T02TD2688E:296a-1: la sngags kyis bskor ba kho na la dmigs pa gtang de brjod la phyag rgya dang sngags de'i 'od kyis rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer dang 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams cad der bsdus par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:296a-2: bskor ba'i dus su ni de dag gi 'od zer gyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang sdig pa zad par byas par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:296a-3: yang na padma dang zla ba'i steng du aa yig las rin po che cha gsum pa yi ge dang sngags bsams la brjod pas sngags dang phyag rgya'i 'od zer gyis rang bzhin gyi sngags dang phyag rgya bstim zhing brjod de bskor ba'i dus su sngags dang phyag rgya'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'od zer dang 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams cad bsdu zhing der thim pas de'i 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang sdig pa'i tshogs thams cad zad par yang bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:296a-4: cho ga lhag ma thams cad sngon ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:296a-5: yang na bum pa dang padma zla ba'i steng du aa yig la rin po che cha bzhi pa 'od kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa yi ge dang sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab pa bsams te /
T02TD2688E:296a-6: sngags dang phyag rgya de'i 'od zer gyis rang bzhin grub pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi bstim nas brjod pas bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sgo gang bar bsams te bskor ba'i dus su sems can thams cad kyi lus ngag yid kyi sgo dag par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:296a-7: lhag ma cho ga thams cad sngar ltar ro //
T02TD2688E:296a-8: sku la dmigs nas gzungs bklag pa'i tshul du ni bum pa dang padma zla ba'i steng du aa yig ser po las bcom ldan 'das byang chub chen pos gsil byed dang par bu 'chang ba gser btso ma'i mdog can 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis rin po che'i khri la bzhugs pa bsams te /
T02TD2688E:296a-9: de'i snying gar zla ba la aa yig sngags kyis bskor ba bsams te rang bzhin gyis byang chub chen po dang tha mi dad par byas nas sngags brjod pa'i tshe dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo dang byang chub sems dpas bum pa du ma dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi chus gang ba du ma thogs nas dbang bskur bas de'i dbu la sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa bsam pa dang sku du ma yang gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:296b-0: de nas bskor @296b ba'i dus su sku de las byung ba'i lha mo'i chogs kyis bdag la dbang bskur te bdag gi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:296b-1: de nas rang bzhin gyi lha thams cad gshegs te /
T02TD2688E:296b-2: sku de 'od du zhu bar dmigs te khrus bya'o //
T02TD2688E:296b-3: lhag ma cho ga thams cad sngon ldar ro //
T02TD2688E:296b-4: yang na padma dang zla ba'i dbus su bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i byang chub chen po bsam pa'am yang na chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsams te cho ga thams cad sngon ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:296b-5: sku dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la dmigs nas gzungs bklag pa ni /
T02TD2688E:296b-6: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharma:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD2688E:296b-7: zhes brjod pas bum pa mi dmigs pa'i ngang las yi ge bh'um las spos kyi khang pa rim pa gsum rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing tva ra na la sogs pas mdzes pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02TD2688E:296b-8: dar dpyangs dang dril bu dang zla phyed rdo rje dang kra ma shirsha dang dar bu kan la sogs pa gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du mas legs par spras pa rtse mo gcig tu bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2688E:296b-9: pam las padma dang aa las zla ba'i steng du lha thams cad bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:296b-10: de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa ltar te /
T02TD2688E:296b-11: rin chen rab bkod gzhal yas ni //
T02TD2688E:296b-12: spos kyis brgyan pa'i khang pa ru //
T02TD2688E:296b-13: rab zhi sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa'i //
T02TD2688E:296b-14: dkyil 'khor lha yi tshogs rnams bsgom //
T02TD2688E:296b-15: a'a: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2688E:296b-16: thub pa'i nyi ma bye ba'i 'od //
T02TD2688E:296b-17: dur smrig gos can gser mdog sku //
T02TD2688E:296b-18: chos 'chad phyag rgya ldan pa ni //
T02TD2688E:296b-19: zhal bzhi phyag brgyad zhabs bzhi pa //
T02TD2688E:296b-20: sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs nas ni //
T02TD2688E:296b-21: 'gro la thugs rje'i gzigs pa po //
T02TD2688E:296b-22: dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02TD2688E:296b-23: de yi mdun du gsang sgrub mo //
T02TD2688E:296b-24: gur skyes dkar mo bsil yab 'chang //
T02TD2688E:296b-25: gtso bo'i g-yas su aa yig las //
T02TD2688E:296b-26: tshe 'dzin ma ste gser mdog can //
T02TD2688E:296b-27: dkar mo bum pa 'chang ba ni //
T02TD2688E:296b-29: gtso bo'i g-yon du bhr'um yig las //
T02TD2688E:296b-30: bsod nams ldan ma dkar mo ni //
T02TD2688E:297a-2: rgyab tu phyag rgya bstan pa ni //
T02TD2688E:297a-3: yum skyes dmar po phreng ba 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297a-4: shar gyi 'dab mar sum yig las //
T02TD2688E:297a-5: bsod nams gzigs ma dkar gsal mo //
T02TD2688E:297a-6: g-yas kyis legs so g-yon pas ni //
T02TD2688E:297a-8: lhor ni pu rna rnam gzigs ma //
T02TD2688E:297a-10: nub tu shin tu go cha mo //
T02TD2688E:297a-12: byang du yang dag 'chang byed mo //
T02TD2688E:297a-14: byang shar pram yig las skyes pa'i //
T02TD2688E:297a-15: so so 'brang ma ljang ser mo //
T02TD2688E:297a-16: lag g-yas skyabs kyi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2688E:297a-18: shar lhor aam las mdangs ldan mo //
T02TD2688E:297a-19: ku mu ta 'dzin ser skya mo //
T02TD2688E:297a-20: lho nub pam las gzi ldan mo //
T02TD2688E:297a-22: nub byang dzam las rgyas ldan ma //
T02TD2688E:297a-24: de kun zhi ba'i cha byad can ;
T02TD2688E:297a-25: / zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan pa la //
T02TD2688E:297a-26: rin chen sna tshogs kyis spras pa //
T02TD2688E:297a-28: shar sgo lam las skyes pa yi //
T02TD2688E:297a-30: lho sgor gshin rje 'joms pa ni //
T02TD2688E:297a-31: yam skyes sngo nag dbyug pa 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297a-32: nub sgor gshin rje sdom byed ma //
T02TD2688E:297a-33: yam skyes dmar mo lcags sgrog 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297a-34: byang sgor sam skyes legs skyong ma //
T02TD2688E:297a-35: rdo rje zhags 'dzin d'ur ba'i mdog / de kun khro mo'i cha byad la //
T02TD2688E:297a-36: zhal gcig phyag gnyis brkyang bskum can //
T02TD2688E:297a-37: rin chen rgyan dang sprul gyis spras //
T02TD2688E:297a-38: spyan gsum skra ser mche ba gtsigs //
T02TD2688E:297a-39: dkyil 'khor de yi rgyab tu ni //
T02TD2688E:297a-40: phyag rgya kha dog tha dad pa'i //
T02TD2688E:297a-41: sangs rgyas stong rnams bsam bya ba //
T02TD2688E:297a-42: chos gos gsum dang ldan pa ste //
T02TD2688E:297a-43: kun kyang padma zla ba la //
T02TD2688E:297a-44: sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung gis //
T02TD2688E:297a-45: 'gro la thugs rje cher gzigs nas //
T02TD2688E:297a-48: byang chub sems tshogs nyan thos bcas //
T02TD2688E:297a-49: ded dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
T02TD2688E:297a-50: mdog dbyibs gos rgyan tha dad can //
T02TD2688E:297a-51: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:297b-0: dam chos gleng slong rgyas byed @297b tshul ;
T02TD2688E:297b-1: / pus mo'i lha nga sar btsugs nas //
T02TD2688E:297b-3: zhes gsungs pa'i tshul du bsgoms nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas mchod de /
T02TD2688E:297b-4: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bsres nas tha mi dad par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:297b-5: yang rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbu la padma dang zla ba la aom yig dkar po'o //
T02TD2688E:297b-6: mgrin par padma dmar po la gnas pa'i yi ge a'a:dmar po dang snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig sngon po bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:297b-7: de nas gzungs kyi phreng ba bklags pa'i tshe lha thams cad snying gar rang gi sa bon dang sngags kyi phreng ba'i 'od zer gyis rang bzhin gyi 'od zer dang 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams cad bsdus te lha thams cad la so sor thim par yang bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:297b-8: lhag ma thams cad sngon gyi cho gas shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:297b-9: yang na dkyil 'khor du lha mo brgyad bsam ste /
T02TD2688E:297b-10: shar du lam las tshe 'dzin ma //
T02TD2688E:297b-11: dkar mo rdo rje dril bu 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297b-12: lhor ni bam las rnam rgyal ma //
T02TD2688E:297b-13: ser mo gos bzang rnga yab 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297b-14: nub tu sam las bde sbyin ma //
T02TD2688E:297b-16: byang du dzam las 'bar byed ma //
T02TD2688E:297b-18: h'um las skyes pa'i khro mo bzhi //
T02TD2688E:297b-19: sgo bzhir mkhas pas dgod par bya //
T02TD2688E:297b-20: shar du gshin rje 'joms ma ni //
T02TD2688E:297b-22: lhor ni gshin rje dbyug pa mo //
T02TD2688E:297b-23: ser mo rin chen dbyug tho 'dzin //
T02TD2688E:297b-25: dmar mo padma'i phreng ba can //
T02TD2688E:297b-26: byang du gshin rje drag sel mo //
T02TD2688E:297b-27: sngon mo chu srin 'dzin pa mo //
T02TD2688E:297b-28: zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rgyud du gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:297b-29: lha dgur bsgom pa rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yin te gtso bo ni sngon ltar ro //
T02TD2688E:297b-30: gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang sde dpon thams cad sngon ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:297b-31: yang na 'di ltar sngar mos na //
T02TD2688E:297b-32: shar du aam las lcags kyu ma //
T02TD2688E:297b-33: dkar mo lcags kyu phreng ba 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297b-34: lhor ni bam las zhags pa mo //
T02TD2688E:297b-35: ser mo zhags pa rnga yab 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297b-36: nub tu yam las lcags sgrog ma //
T02TD2688E:297b-37: dmar mo lcags sgrog ril ba 'chang //
T02TD2688E:297b-38: byang du dzam las 'bebs byed ma //
T02TD2688E:297b-39: ljang gu dril bu sil phreng 'chang //
T02TD2688E:298a-1: pa'i lha mo bzhis gtso bo la bskor ba'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-2: gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la sogs pa mi dgos so //
T02TD2688E:298a-3: de ltar rgyas bsdus gang bsgom yang rang bzhin gyi lha dang tha mi dad par byas nas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-4: de nas bzlas pa'i dus su lha so so'i snying gar sngags kyi 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus nas dbang bskur rigs tha dad kyis dbu brgyan par blta'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-5: bskor ba'i dus su cho ga lhag ma sngon ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-6: gzhan yang rig sngags yi ge'i tshul du bklag pa ni bum par padma dkar po'i steng du zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um sngon po la sngags kyi phreng bas bskor ba'am yang na dbus kyi phyogs su h'um kha dog bzhir bsam /
T02TD2688E:298a-7: mtshams bzhir aam bam sam dzam bzhi kha dog bzhi dang yi ge dgu po re re yang sngags kyi phreng ba kha dog tha dad pas bskor pa la dmigs nas brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-8: cho ga lhag ma sngon ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-9: gzhan yang rig sngags phyag rgya la dmigs nas bklag pa ni bum pa bhr'um las rin po che'i mchod rten sgo gcig pa dkar po'i nang du padma dang zla ba la h'um las rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa sngags kyi phrang ba dang bcas pa dmigs la sngon ltar brjod do ;
T02TD2688E:298a-10: / yang na bum pa mchod rten gyi nang der padma dang zla ba'i steng du 'khor lo ser po rtsibs bzhi pa'i steng du rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa bsams te 'khor lo'i rtsibs la /
T02TD2688E:298a-11: aam bam sam dzam bzhi bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:298a-12: rdo rje'i lte ba la h'um bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:298a-13: de re re la sngags kyi phreng bas so sor bskor bar dmigs te bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-14: yang na de nyid ltar bsams pa las rdo rje'i steng du gdugs dkar po sngags kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa la dmigs pa gtad de bklag go //
T02TD2688E:298a-15: cho ga lhag ma sngon ltar ro /
T02TD2688E:298a-17: // / rig sngags sku la dmigs nas brjod pa ni /
T02TD2688E:298a-18: bum pa la mchod rten sngon ltar dmigs pa las padma dang zla ba'i steng du aa las dang po'i sangs rgyas dkar por dmigs te bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298a-19: de yang chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can nam yang na snying gar thal mo sbyar ba'am yang na rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2688E:298b-0: dkyil 'khor 'khor lor mos kyang dang por sangs @298b rgyas la bskor ba'i lha'i tshogs gang 'dod pa gong ltar ro //
T02TD2688E:298b-1: gal te bum pa la brten te gsang sngags kyi tshul du klog na yang de ltar tshul gsum kho na'o //
T02TD2688E:298b-2: gsang sngags yi ge'i tshul du bklag na bum pa dang padma zla ba la aom yig dkar po la sngags phreng dkar pos bskor ba la dmigs nas bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298b-3: yang na aom yig la aam bam sam dzam gyis bskor ba'i yi ge lnga'am /
T02TD2688E:298b-4: yang na h'um bzhis bskor ba'i yi ge lnga'am /
T02TD2688E:298b-5: yang na aam la sogs pa yi ge dgu la sngags kyi phreng ba dkar pos bskor nas gsal ba'i rnam pa la dmigs te /
T02TD2688E:298b-7: / gsang sngags phyag rgya la dmigs pa yang bum pa mchod rten du sngar ltar bsams nas de'i nang du padma dang zla ba'i steng du 'khor lor ao dang bcas pa la yi ge'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'am /
T02TD2688E:298b-8: yang na rigs lnga'i phyag rgya la de ltar bsam pa'am /
T02TD2688E:298b-9: yang na yum bzhi'i phyag rgya dang dgu la brten pa'i sa bon dang sngags su bcas pa'i dmigs pa gtad nas brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298b-10: gsang sngags kyi tshul sku la brten nas brjod pa ni bum pa mchod rten du dmigs te rnam par snang mdzad dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can nam /
T02TD2688E:298b-11: yang na zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
T02TD2688E:298b-12: phyag gnyis chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can bya'o //
T02TD2688E:298b-13: yang na zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa zhabs kyang brgyad de byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang sems dpa'i skyil krung can no //
T02TD2688E:298b-14: de ltar sku sngags dang bcas pa la dmigs nas brjod pa ni sku dpa' bo gcig pu la dmigs pa gsum mo //
T02TD2688E:298b-15: gsang sngags kyi tshul dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa ni bum pa bhr'um las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa padma dang zla bas brgyan pa'i steng du gong gi lha tshogs gang 'dod pa rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba dmigs te /
T02TD2688E:298b-17: mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni bka' drin rjes su dran pa'i mchod pa ste /
T02TD2688E:298b-18: dkyil 'khor yang mchod cing dge 'dun gyi ston mo dang tha na byis pa dang dud 'gro yan chad la sbyin gtor ci 'byor pa bya'o //
T02TD2688E:299a-0: cho ga de dag gi phan yon gsungs @299a * //
T02TD2688E:299a-2: cho ga 'di lan cig byas na la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD2688E:299a-3: 'dir bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bzhin du la sogs pa ni rgyun du bzlas pa phan yon dang bcas pa gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:299a-4: de la rgyun du bzlas pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2688E:299a-5: sngon gyi dran zhes dang sbyar nas dran zhes bya ba ni gnyis te /
T02TD2688E:299a-6: bag yod pa'i gnas dran pa dang /
T02TD2688E:299a-7: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas dran pa'o //
T02TD2688E:299a-8: de la bag yod pa'i gnas ni gzungs sngags rin po che 'di brjod pa yang lus ma gus pa dang ngag ma gus pa dang bral bar bya ste /
T02TD2688E:299a-9: ra ro ba dang rnam par g-yeng ba dang bya ba gzhan gyis g-yeng ba dang chu dang bshang ba 'dor ba dang zas za ba dang 'chag pa dang nyal ba dang 'phres pa dang gtam gyis bar chod pa la sogs pa gang yang med pa dal ba dang dga' ba dang rangs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi don dran pa ni dang por kha la sogs pa khrus byas la gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas skyil krung legs par stan bde ba la gnas te thal mo snying gar sbyar sngags tshar gcig brjod nas phreng ba bgrang zhing bdun la sogs pa ci nus pa'i grangs ma nor bar sngags yi ge lhag chad med pa la dmigs te /
T02TD2688E:299a-10: ha cang dal ba dang myur ba spangs te gsal zhing phyed par chad lhag med par gzhan gyi gtam la sogs pas bar mchod par bzla'o //
T02TD2688E:299a-11: de'i rjes su smon lam shloka gcig la sogs pas dge ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:299a-12: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2688E:299a-13: nyan thos rang rgyal 'jig rten skyong //
T02TD2688E:299a-14: mthu dang bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2688E:299a-17: yang na dang por skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed da sdom pa gzung ba nas rdo rje thal mo dang po kha'i thad du sbyar /
T02TD2688E:299a-18: de nas snying gar sbyar la snying gar padma dang zla ba la aa yig dkar po la dmigs te sngags de la bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis bdag gi sdig pa dag par bsam zhing sngags dal ba dang myur ba dang mi gsal ba'i skyon dang bral bas 'byes shing gdangs snyan pos lhag chad med par bklag cing gzhan gyi gtam la sogs pa'i bar chad spangs nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2688E:299b-0: sngags tshar gnyis pa nas ni phreng ba bgrang zhing grangs ma nor bar byas te nyi shu rtsa @299b gcig la sogs ci nus pa bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:299b-1: de nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du shlo ka gnyis la sogs bas dge ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:299b-2: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-3: nyan thos rang rgyal 'phags tshogs dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-4: 'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen rnams //
T02TD2688E:299b-5: kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2688E:299b-6: mthu stobs bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2688E:299b-7: 'jig rten pa rnams skyid pa dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-8: 'byung po thams cad bde ba dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-9: chos rnams dus su ston par shog / ces so //
T02TD2688E:299b-10: yang na khrus byas dri zhim po dang ldan pas //
T02TD2688E:299b-11: dang por 'gro ba la tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba byas nas /
T02TD2688E:299b-12: spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying gar rdo rje thal mo sbyar zhing sngags lan gsum brjod la snying gar padma dang zla ba'i steng du aa yig dkar po sngags phreng dkar pos bskor ba la dmigs te /
T02TD2688E:299b-13: de la sgra grag bar bsam zhing phreng ba blangs nas myur ba dang dal ba dang mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa'i skyon dang bral bas /
T02TD2688E:299b-14: snyan pa'i gdangs kyis lhag chad med par g-yang ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
T02TD2688E:299b-15: gzhan gyi tshig par chad la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas /
T02TD2688E:299b-16: brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ci rigs par ma nor bar bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:299b-17: de nas ni bdag dang gzhan skye ba 'ding sdug bsngal mi bskyed pa dang skye ba gzhan du bde ba dang myur du byang chub thob pa'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pas legs par bsngo zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan gsum la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:299b-18: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-19: 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-20: 'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-21: sngags kyi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2688E:299b-22: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi //
T02TD2688E:299b-23: nad med tshe ring dpal 'byor dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-24: bde skyid nyams dga' thob pa dang //
T02TD2688E:299b-25: sems kyi g-yeng ba bral nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:299b-26: zab mo'i chos la longs spyod cing //
T02TD2688E:299b-27: gzhan don byed la brtson pa yi //
T02TD2688E:299b-28: thugs rje'i rgyun dang mi 'bral bar //
T02TD2688E:299b-29: bde ba'i zhing mchog rol par shog / ces bya ba thugs rje mi bshol pa'i rgyud du gsungs pas de ltar spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300a-0: de gsum ni sngags la dmigs pa @300a * //
T02TD2688E:300a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2688E:300a-3: khams dang dbang po'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2688E:300a-4: sngags brjod dmigs pa tha dad de //
T02TD2688E:300a-5: sgra gsal tsam la rtog pa dang //
T02TD2688E:300a-6: snying po yi ge la dmigs dang //
T02TD2688E:300a-7: sngags phreng la ni dmigs pa rnams //
T02TD2688E:300a-8: shes rab kyis ni ci bder sbyar //
T02TD2688E:300a-9: dmigs dang bcas par brjod pa ni //
T02TD2688E:300a-10: nad sel dug sle shes rab 'phel //
T02TD2688E:300a-11: tshe ring dpal 'byor thob pa dang //
T02TD2688E:300a-12: byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:300a-13: de phyir brtson pas rtse gcig tu //
T02TD2688E:300a-14: bklags la shin tu brtson par bya //
T02TD2688E:300a-15: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so ;
T02TD2688E:300a-18: lhag chad nga ro ngan spangs nas //
T02TD2688E:300a-19: sems g-yeng rmugs par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2688E:300a-20: gtam gzhan sbyor ba rab dor te //
T02TD2688E:300a-22: mchod rten bum pa'am 'od zer sogs //
T02TD2688E:300a-23: bsgrub bya la sogs gang yin la ;
T02TD2688E:300a-24: / sems rtse gcig pas snyan par brjod //
T02TD2688E:300a-25: ces bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T02TD2688E:300a-26: da ni phyag rgya la dmigs pa gsum brjod de /
T02TD2688E:300a-27: yang na dang por gdong la sogs pa khrus byas nas kha dri zhim par byas te /
T02TD2688E:300a-28: tshad med pa bsgom pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas thal mo snying gar sbyar nas sngags lan cig brjod do //
T02TD2688E:300a-29: de nas phreng ba blangs nas brjod pa'i tshe sngags kyi mthus mdun gyi nam mkha' la rin po che cha gsum pa zhig byung zhing yang nas yang du bdag gi mdzod spur thim par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300a-30: de ltar myur ba dang dal ba dang mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa dang 'khrugs pa dang lhag pa dang chad pa dang ro ngan pa spangs nas g-yeng ba spangs la sems rtse gcig pas snyan pa'i sgras brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300a-31: de bzhin du gzhan gyi gtam la sogs pas bar ma chod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300a-32: de ltar bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis bdag nyid kyi lus sems yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba ltar 'gyur bar yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300a-33: de nas dge ba'i smon lam shlo ka gcig la sogs pa yang brjod do //
T02TD2688E:300b-0: yang na dang po gdong la sogs pa dag par byas nas ka dang lus sman dri zhim pos byugs la 'gro ba la snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas @300b skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba byas la kha dang snying gar thal mo sbyar nas sngags tshar gnyis bklags la phreng ba bzung nas 'di bsam /
T02TD2688E:300b-1: mdun du yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba sngon po 'od dkar po 'phro ba cha gsum dang ldan pa padma'i steng na yod par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:300b-2: de'i 'od zer gyis bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo dag par bsam zhing myur ba dang dal ba dang mi gsal ba dang ma 'dres pa dang 'khrugs pa dang lhag pa dang chad pa dang nga ro ngan pa spangs nas gzhan gyi gtam la sogs pa bar chad thams cad bral bar byas la /
T02TD2688E:300b-3: g-yeng ba dang rmugs pa med par sems rtse gcig pa'i sems dang ldan zhing snyan pa'i sngags kyis nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci nus pa bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300b-4: de'i dge ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi lus ngag yid gsum 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i mthu khyad par can dang ldan par gyur par yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300b-5: de nas rang dang gzhan don du dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gnyis la sogs pa ci rigs par bklags te rin po che padma dang bcas pa dag gi mgrin pa'i nang du thim nas snying gar zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:300b-6: yang na dang por gdong la sogs pa dag par byas nas kha dang yan lag dri zhim pos byugs te /
T02TD2688E:300b-9: snying gar thal mos byar zhing sngags tshar gsum brjod la /
T02TD2688E:300b-10: mdun gyi nam mkha' padma'i steng yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che cha gsum pa 'od kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa rab tu 'phro ba de de'i nang nas aa yig la sngags dkar pos bskor ba bsams nas phreng ba blangs te sngags brjod pa'i tshe rin po che 'od dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa yang bsal te gzhan khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa yang bsal bar bsam par bya'o ;
T02TD2688E:300b-11: / de ltar myur ba dang dal ba dang mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa dang 'khrugs pa dang lhag pa dang chad pa dang nga ro ngan pa spangs te /
T02TD2688E:301a-0: gzhan gyi gtam la sogs pas bar ma chod par g-yeng ba dang rmugs pa med cing sems rtse gcig pa dang ldan pas bsnyen pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgya @301a * //
T02TD2688E:301a-1: la sogs pa ci rigs par bzlas te /
T02TD2688E:301a-2: de'i dge ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba ltar gyur nas gzhan gyi don la thogs pa med pa'i mthu dang ldan par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:301a-3: mdun gyi padma dang nor bu rin po che yang bdag gi spyi gtsug tu thim nas lus thams cad du khyab ste snying gar gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:301a-4: de nas bdag dang gzhan skye ba 'dir sdug bsngal med pa dang /
T02TD2688E:301a-5: skye ba gzhan du bde ba dang /
T02TD2688E:301a-6: byang chub myur du thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i don du smon lam gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum la la sogs pas legs par bsngos la /
T02TD2688E:301a-7: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa yang lan gsum la sogs pa ci nus par dal gyis bklags nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:301a-8: de ltar phyag rgya la dmigs pa ni gsum kho na ste /
T02TD2688E:301a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel pa'i rgyud chen po las kyang rags pa la 'jug gang zag dang //
T02TD2688E:301a-10: rten pa dag ni goms pa yi //
T02TD2688E:301a-11: khams dang dbang po'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2688E:301a-12: phyag rgya la ni dmigs pa yang //
T02TD2688E:301a-13: brjod pa tha dad gsum yin no //
T02TD2688E:301a-14: don gyis dag par byed pa dang //
T02TD2688E:301a-15: snying po'i tshul du sbyor ba dang //
T02TD2688E:301a-16: rang bzhin nyid du byin brlabs nas //
T02TD2688E:301a-17: gang gis yang dang yang brjod na //
T02TD2688E:301a-18: phyag rgya rten gyi byin rlabs dang //
T02TD2688E:301a-19: sngags kyi mthu ni sgrub pa la //
T02TD2688E:301a-20: nad dang gdon dang dug rnams dang //
T02TD2688E:301a-21: 'jigs pa brgyad po sel bar byed //
T02TD2688E:301a-22: bdag nyid tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing //
T02TD2688E:301a-23: longs spyod rgyas te dbang po rgyas //
T02TD2688E:301a-25: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:301a-26: sku la dmigs pa ni dang po khrus byas te kha dang yan lag dri zhim pas bsgos nas thal mo snying gar sbyar nas sngags lan cig brjod de /
T02TD2688E:301a-27: mdun du byang chub chen po'i sku padma dang zla ba la gnas pa gser btso ma'i mdog can rin po che'i khri la bzhugs pa /
T02TD2688E:301a-28: gsil byed dang par bu 'chang ba /
T02TD2688E:301b-0: shin tu 'dzum bzhin par bzhugs pas bdag gi sngags brjod pa'i dbang po byed par bsams la phreng ba blangs la myur ba dang dal ba dang mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa dang 'khrugs pa dang lhag pa dang chad pa dang nga ro @301b ngan pa dag spangs nas gzhan gyi gtam la sogs pas bar ma chod par g-yeng ba dang rmugs pa med cing sems rtse gcig pa dang ldan pas snyan pa'i sngags kyis bdun la sogs pa ci rigs par bzlas te /
T02TD2688E:301b-1: de'i dge ba'i byin rlabs kyis bdag gi sdig pa thams cad dag par yang dang yang du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:301b-2: de nas rang grol ba dag pa'i don du dge ba'i smon lam shlo ka gcig la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:301b-3: yang na dang por khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan zhing kha dang yan lag thams cad dri zhim pos byugs nas rdo rje thal mo spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang /
T02TD2688E:301b-4: snying gar sbyar nas sngags tshar re re legs par brjod nas mdun du padma dang zla ba la dmigs pa'i byang chub chen po gong gi mtshan nyid can bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya mdzad ba des bdag la chos 'chad par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:301b-5: phreng ba blangs la myur ba la sogs pa'i skyon spangs te /
T02TD2688E:301b-6: sngags snyan pas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod nas bden ba de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi sdig pa thams cad dag cing lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas gzhan gyi don byed pa la thogs pa med pa dang ldan par gyur par yang dang yang du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:301b-7: de nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gnyis la sogs pa ci rigs par bklags te /
T02TD2688E:301b-8: bcom ldan 'das gdan dang bcas pa bdag gi mgrin pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas snying gar thim ste skyil krung gis gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:301b-9: yang na gdong la sogs pa dag par byas nas kha dang yan lag thams cad dri zhim pos byugs te /
T02TD2688E:301b-10: spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying gar thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2688E:301b-11: sngags tshar re re brjod nas mdun du padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa'i byang chub chen po chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can mtshan nyid thams cad gong ltar bsams nas phreng ba blangs te sngags brjod pa'i tshe sku'i ba spu'i gseb thams cad dang /
T02TD2688E:301b-12: zhabs long bu la sogs pa thams cad nas 'od zer kha dog sna lnga la grangs bye ba phrag drug cu byung nas bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo thams cad dag par byas par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:301b-13: de ltar g-yeng ba dang rmugs pa dang /
T02TD2688E:302a-1: gtam la sogs pa'i bar chad thams cad dang bral ba dang myur ba dang ngal ba dang mi gsal ba dang 'dres pa dang 'khrugs pa dang lhag pa dang chad pa dang nga ro ngan pa spangs te //
T02TD2688E:302a-2: ngag snyan pos brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302a-3: bden pa de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad dag cing bdag gi lus kyi 'od kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad bsal bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan dang bcas pa bdag gi spyi bo nas snying gar zhugs te dgyes shing 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang ldan pas skyil krung gis bzhugs par bsams la de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad skye ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' dag dang bral ba dang /
T02TD2688E:302a-5: skye ba gzhan du bde ba khyad par can dang ldan pa dang byang chub myur du thob par bya ba'i dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pas legs par bsdos la rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa yang lan gsum la sogs pa ci rigs su dal gyis bklags nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302a-6: de ltar sku la dmigs pa gsum kho na ste /
T02TD2688E:302a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud chen po las //
T02TD2688E:302a-8: gtso bo sh'akya seng ge'i sku //
T02TD2688E:302a-10: mtshan dang dpe byad rab rgyas la //
T02TD2688E:302a-12: khams dang dbang po'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2688E:302a-13: mdzad pa'i rnam pa tha dad par //
T02TD2688E:302a-14: gdul bya'i don du rab tu snang //
T02TD2688E:302a-15: bdag gis gang mos de dang der //
T02TD2688E:302a-16: dmigs te sngags brjod mthu yis ni //
T02TD2688E:302a-17: 'gro ba'i nad sel sman pa che //
T02TD2688E:302a-19: dbu la phongs mya ngan 'jigs pa med //
T02TD2688E:302a-20: zhing khams thams cad rab sbyong zhing //
T02TD2688E:302a-21: 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson pa //
T02TD2688E:302a-22: ded dbon chen po skyabs kyi mchog / rab grags sku ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:302a-23: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:302a-24: de ltar sngags kyi sbyor ba'i gzungs sngags su sgrub pa'i phyogs brjod nas /
T02TD2688E:302b-0: da ni rigs sngags su sgrub pa'i phyogs brjod @302b par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302b-1: 'di yang sngags dang phyag rgya dang sku la dmigs pa ste /
T02TD2688E:302b-2: de dag dbang po'i bye brag gis gsum gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302b-3: de yang sngags la dmigs pa ni khrus dang gcang sbra dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sngom pa gzung ba sngon ltar byas nas snying gar thal mo sbyar nas sngags tshar gcig brjod nas bdag gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um yig dkar po sngags kyis bskor ba bsams la /
T02TD2688E:302b-4: phreng ba blangs la bdun la sogs pa brjod pa'i tshe h'um yig gi 'od kyis bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa dag par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:302b-5: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon ni rnam pa bcu gcig dang bral bas snyan pa'i sgras bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302b-6: brjod pa de'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad gzungs kyi phreng ba 'di kho na dang bdag la yang dag par bsams la de las byung ba'i dge bas bdag sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i smon lam shlo ka gcig la sogs pas bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302b-7: yang na dang por khrus dang gtsang sbra la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang 'gro ba la tshad med pa bsgom pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba byas nas snying ga dang mgrin par thal mo sbyar bar byas nas tshar re re brjod de /
T02TD2688E:302b-8: phreng ba blangs nas bdag gi snying ga dang mgrin par padma dang zla ba la h'um yig dkar po sngags kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa bsams nas brjod pa'i tshe sngags kyi 'od kyis bdag dang khams gsum pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:302b-9: de ltar g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon bcu gcig dang bral bas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs par bklags nas de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi bsam pa'i rgyud 'gro ba tshim pa'i chos kyi char chen po'i gzhir gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:302b-10: bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bsngo ba shlo ka gnyis la sogs pa smon lam yang btab nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:302b-11: yang na dang po khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan pas tshad med pa bzhis 'gro ba la bltas nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2688E:303a-0: sdom pa bzung nas gnas gsum du thal mo sbyar zhing brjod nas bdag gi gnas @303a * //
T02TD2688E:303a-1: gsum du padma dang zla ba la h'um yig dkar po sngags phreng gis bskor ba la dmigs te /
T02TD2688E:303a-2: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon bcu gcig dang bral zhing snyan pa'i ngag kyis brjod de /
T02TD2688E:303a-3: sngags kyi 'od zer kha dog lnga'i tshul du 'phro bas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i nad dang gnod pa dang nyon mongs pa lnga la sogs pa zad par byas par bsam zhing rgyun ni 'chad pa'am brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:303a-4: de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag gi lus sgyu ma lta bur gyur nas sngags kyi rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:303a-5: bdag dang sems can thams cad nad dang gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
T02TD2688E:303a-6: skye ba thams cad du gnod pa med cing bde ba dang byang chub thob par bya ba'i don du dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pas bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:303a-7: de ltar de dag ni rig sngags yi ge'i tshul du 'don pa ste sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa'i rgyud las //
T02TD2688E:303a-8: rig sngags yi ge'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2688E:303a-9: khams dang dbang po'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2688E:303a-10: tha dad du mar gnas mod kyang //
T02TD2688E:303a-11: don ni sngags kyi rang bzhin dngos //
T02TD2688E:303a-12: gang gis de shes 'don pa la //
T02TD2688E:303a-13: tshe 'dir gnod pa kun bral nas //
T02TD2688E:303a-14: bde ba'i rgyu dang ma bral bar //
T02TD2688E:303a-15: bde ba can du myur du skye //
T02TD2688E:303a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:303a-17: yang na rig sngags phyag rgya'i tshul du brjod na khrus la sogs pa gtsang sbra dang /
T02TD2688E:303a-18: tshad med pa bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2688E:303a-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2688E:303a-21: sdom ba gzung ba la sogs pa sngon ltar byas snying gar thal mo sbyar nas sngags brjod de /
T02TD2688E:303a-22: bdag gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa aas mtshan pa sngags kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa dmigs te /
T02TD2688E:303a-23: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon bcu gcig dang bral bas bdun la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod pa'i tshe rdo rje sngags dang bcas pa de'i 'od zer gyis bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo dag par byas shing de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:303b-0: de nas dge ba'i smon lam shlo ka gcig la sogs pa brjod @303b nas ci rigs par ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:303b-1: yang na khrus dang gtsang sbra dang tshad med pa bsgom pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba sngon ltar byas nas /
T02TD2688E:303b-2: snying ga dang mgrin par rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sngags brjod pas bdag gi snying ga dang mgrin par padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa aam yig la sngags phreng gis bskor ba dang bcas ba dmigs la /
T02TD2688E:303b-3: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs su brjod pa'i tshe rdo rje dang sngags kyi 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig pa'i tshogs sbyongs shing ji srid 'khor ba'i skye rgan 'chi'i chu bo 'joms par byed cing rdo rje'i lus su gyur nas bstan pa'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:303b-4: de nas bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad sdig pa thams cad zad pa la sogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gnyis la sogs pa ci rigs par bsngos nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:303b-5: yang na khrus dang gtsang sbra dang tshad med pa bsgom pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba sngon ltar byas te /
T02TD2688E:303b-6: sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa gzung ba sngon ltar byas nas rdo rje thal mo gnas gsum du sbyar te /
T02TD2688E:303b-7: sngags tshar gsum du brjod nas gnas gsum du padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga ba aa yig la sngags kyis bskor bar bsams nas /
T02TD2688E:303b-8: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams spangs nas /
