T02TD2688E:303b-9: brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod pa'i sngags rdo rje'i 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad la reg pa tsam gyis nad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal zhing /
T02TD2688E:303b-10: sdig pa thams cad dag par byas nas /
T02TD2688E:303b-11: byang chub kyi sems rgya cher 'phel bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:303b-12: de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad chos spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:303b-13: de nas bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad skye ba nas skye bar sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba dang /
T02TD2688E:303b-14: bde ba khyad par can dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2688E:303b-15: byang chub myur du thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2688E:304a-0: smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pas dge ba bsngos @304a * //
T02TD2688E:304a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa yang lan gsum la sogs pa brjod do //
T02TD2688E:304a-3: de ltar rig sngags phyag rgya'i tshul gsum pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:304a-4: gang zhig yid mnyam 'jog pa ni //
T02TD2688E:304a-5: rdo rje'i mtshan ma sngags bcas la //
T02TD2688E:304a-6: sgo gsum gang dang gang du dmigs //
T02TD2688E:304a-7: de dang der ni blo gtad nas //
T02TD2688E:304a-8: brjod pas nad sel tshe ring zhing //
T02TD2688E:304a-10: blo 'phel rig pa chen po'i sa //
T02TD2688E:304a-11: skyes bu des ni myur thar 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:304a-12: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so ;
T02TD2688E:304a-13: / rig sngags sku la dmigs pa ni khrus dang gtsang sbra dang skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed la sogs pa gong ltar byas nas rang gi snying gar thal mo sbyar te tshar gcig brjod nas rang gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa dkar po sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:304a-14: de'i 'od zer dang mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rgyas pa la blo gtad nas g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas snyan cing grims pa'i tshul gyis tshar bdun la sogs pa bklags nas bden pa de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag gi lus dang po sangs rgyas su brtan par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:304a-15: smon lam shlo ka gcig la sogs pa yang gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:304a-16: yang na khrus la sogs pa sngon ltar byas la snying ga dang mgrin pa'i gnas su thal mo sbyar te tshar re brjod pas dang po'i sangs rgyas bsams te /
T02TD2688E:304a-17: de dag gi 'od zer dang gzi brjid kyis bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum sbyangs shing dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgrubs te /
T02TD2688E:304a-18: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa bklag go //
T02TD2688E:304a-19: bden pa de'i mthus bdag gzhan don byed pa'i nus pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par yang bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:304a-20: de nas shlo ka gnyis la sogs pas smon lam dge ba'i phyir bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:304a-21: yang na gnas gsum du thal mo sbyar te tshar re brjod pas bdag gi gnas gsum du padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas bsams la /
T02TD2688E:304b-0: de dag gi mtshan dang dpe byad dang @304b gzi brjid kyi mthus bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad dag par bsam zhing g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ci rigs par bklags nas /
T02TD2688E:304b-1: de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig pa'i tshogs bdag gi lus kyi 'od kyis kyang sel bar gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:304b-2: de nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pas smon lam gyi bsngo ba brjod par byas la /
T02TD2688E:304b-3: yi ge brgya pa tshar gsum la sogs pa brjod nas ci bde bas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:304b-4: de ltar rig sngags kyi sku la dmigs nas brjod pa ste /
T02TD2688E:304b-5: gsum po 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:304b-6: lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas sam /
T02TD2688E:304b-7: yang na gcig gam gnyis kyang rung //
T02TD2688E:304b-8: dang po'i sangs rgyas skur gsal la //
T02TD2688E:304b-9: blo gtad ma g-yengs sems kyis bklag / nad dang gdon dang 'jigs brgyad sogs //
T02TD2688E:304b-10: 'tshe ba rnams dang bral nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:304b-11: tshe ring shes rab chen po ste //
T02TD2688E:304b-14: de ltar rig sngags kyi tshul du bklags pa brjod nas /
T02TD2688E:304b-15: da ni gsang sngags kyi tshul du bklag pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:304b-16: de la gsang sngags kyi tshul yi ge la dmigs nas brjod pa ni /
T02TD2688E:304b-17: khrus la sogs pa thams cad sngon ltar byas nas snying gar thal mo sbyar te tshar gcig brjod pa'i mthus bdag gi snying gar padma dang zla ba la aam dkar po sngags phreng 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa dmigs la /
T02TD2688E:304b-18: de'i 'od kyis bdag sngags kyi rang bzhin du bsgrub par bsam zhing g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon spangs nas tshar bdun la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod de /
T02TD2688E:304b-19: de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag sngags bsgrub pa la nus pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par gyur par bsams te /
T02TD2688E:304b-20: dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gcig la sogs ba ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:304b-21: lang na khrus la sogs pa sngon ltar byas la /
T02TD2688E:305a-0: snying ga dang mgrin par thal mo sbyar te sngags tshar re re brjod pas @305a * //
T02TD2688E:305a-1: bdag gi snying ga dang mgrin par padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i aom yig dkar po la sngags phreng 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bsams nas /
T02TD2688E:305a-2: de'i 'od kyis bdag gi sdig pa thams cad dag par bsam zhing g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa dang bral bas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod nas /
T02TD2688E:305a-3: de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gzhan gyi don byed pa la nus pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par gyur pa yang yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:305a-4: rang dang gzhan gyi don du shlo ka gnyis la sogs pa'i smon lam gyi dge ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:305a-5: yang na khrus la sogs pa yan lag thams cad sngon ltar byas nas gnas gsum du thal mo sbyar te tshar gsum brjod nas gnas gsum du padma dang zla ba la aom yig dkar po sngags kyi phreng ba kha dog sna tshogs pas bskor bar bsams la /
T02TD2688E:305a-6: phreng ba blangs la g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa brjod pas bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zad cing sngags kyi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad zad par yang bsams nas /
T02TD2688E:305a-7: de'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad chos don du gnyer ba rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan par gyur nas bstan par shin tu rgyas par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:305a-8: de nas dge ba'i smon lam shlo ka gsum la sogs pa brjod nas yi ge brgya pa brjod de ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:305a-9: de ltar gsang sngags yi ge'i tshul du bklag pa yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rgyud las ;
T02TD2688E:305a-10: gsung gi dam tshig phyag rgya can //
T02TD2688E:305a-11: gsang ba'i yi ge'i tshul du brjod //
T02TD2688E:305a-12: gnas gsum dag tu rgyas btab bsam //
T02TD2688E:305a-13: yang na gcig gam gnyis kyang rung //
T02TD2688E:305a-14: brtan par dmigs nas brjod pa yis //
T02TD2688E:305a-15: nad sel sdig spong tshe ring zhing //
T02TD2688E:305a-17: / gsang sngags longs spyod bdag por 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:305a-18: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:305b-0: gsang sngags phyag rgya la dmigs nas bklag pa ni khrus la sogs pa thams cad sngon ltar byas nas snying gar thal mo sbyar nas sngags brjod pas snying ga nyid du padma dang zla @305b ba la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa aom yig sngags dang bcas pa bsams te /
T02TD2688E:305b-1: phreng ba blangs nas g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa thams cad spangs te brjod pas bdag chos kyi 'khor lo'i bdag por gyur par bsams la bdun la sogs pa ci rigs brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:305b-2: de'i byin rlabs kyis bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba la thogs pa med par gyur par yang bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:305b-3: de nas dge ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs pas bsngo bar byas la /
T02TD2688E:305b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan gsum la sogs pa brjod nas ci bde bar spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:305b-5: yang na khrus la sogs pa thams cad sngon ltar byas nas snying ga dang mgrin par thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2688E:305b-6: tshar re re brjod pas padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa a'am yig ser po dang bcas pa sngags kyis bskor bar bsams la /
T02TD2688E:305b-7: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa spangs nas phreng ba blangs te nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa ci rigs pa brjod de bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig pa zad par byas par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:305b-8: 'di'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis bdag gis 'gro ba'i don du chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad pa bskor bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:305b-9: de nas rang bzhin gyi don du smon lam tshigs su bcad pa gnyis la gnyis la bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:305b-10: yang khrus la sogs pa thams cad sngon ltar byas nas /
T02TD2688E:305b-11: gnas gsum du thal mo sbyar te tshar re re brjod de /
T02TD2688E:305b-12: gnas gsum du padma dang zla ba'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa dkar po aom yig dang sngags phreng du bcas pa bsams nas g-yeng ba la sogs pa thams cad spangs te /
T02TD2688E:305b-13: brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa brjod pa'i tshe /
T02TD2688E:305b-14: 'khor lo dang sngags phreng la sogs pa'i 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo dang ldan par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:305b-15: bden ba'i byin rlabs kyis zhing khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad par gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:305b-16: de nas tshigs su bcad pa gsum la sogs pa ci rigs par brjod nas yi ge brgya pa yang brjod de langs nas ci bde bar spyad do //
T02TD2688E:306a-0: de ltar gsang sngags phyag rgya'i tshul @306a * //
T02TD2688E:306a-1: du 'don pa gsum po ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2688E:306a-2: bskal pa stong phrag bsags pa yi //
T02TD2688E:306a-3: sdig dang gang zhig ldan pas kyang //
T02TD2688E:306a-4: gnas gsum pa'am gnyis sam gcig / phyag rgyas btab nas sngags brjod na //
T02TD2688E:306a-5: chos kyi char chen babs pa ni //
T02TD2688E:306a-6: sdig pa'i dri ma kun bkrus te //
T02TD2688E:306a-7: nad med tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing //
T02TD2688E:306a-8: lha mi kun gyi mchod chen 'thob //
T02TD2688E:306a-9: gang gis yid mnyam gzhag nas ni //
T02TD2688E:306a-10: phyag rgya sngags dang bcas dran la //
T02TD2688E:306a-14: gsang sngags sku la dmigs pa ni khrus la sogs pa sngon ltar byas nas /
T02TD2688E:306a-15: rang gi snying gar thal mo sbyar te tshar gcig brjod pas snying gar padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:306a-16: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas bdun la sogs pa brjod pa'i tshe sku de'i mtshan dang dpe byad dang gzi brjid thams cad rang la 'bar bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:306a-17: de'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs par mos la /
T02TD2688E:306a-18: tshigs su bcad pa gcig la sogs pas smon lam dag pa'i phyir bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:306a-19: yang na khrus la sogs pa sngon ltar rgyas par byas nas snying ga dang mgrin par thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2688E:306a-20: sngags tshar re re brjod pas snying ga dang mgrin par padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhi phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2688E:306a-21: phyag dang po gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo dang chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can gnyis kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can gangs kyi ri bo 'dra ba la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:306a-22: sku de la dmigs pa gtad nas g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa brjod pas sku de'i 'od zer gyis bdag dang gzhan gyi sdig pa thams cad zad par yang yang bsam par byas nas /
T02TD2688E:306b-0: de'i bden @306b pa'i byin rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la shin tu dad par gyur par yang bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:306b-1: de nas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis la sogs pas dge ba'i smon lam bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:306b-2: yang na khrus la sogs pa sngar ltar rgyas par byas nas /
T02TD2688E:306b-3: gnas gsum du rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sngags tshar re brjod nas gnas gsum du padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dkar po //
T02TD2688E:306b-4: zhal bzhi phyag brgyad zhabs brgyad /
T02TD2688E:306b-5: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2688E:306b-6: rin po che'i na bza' dang rgyan du mas brgyan cing 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa bsams la /
T02TD2688E:306b-7: g-yeng ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa brjod pa'i tshe sku de dag kun gyi mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'od kyis bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i cha byad du byas par bsam /
T02TD2688E:306b-8: de'i byin rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mngon du gyur bar bsams la bdag gzhan gyi don du smon lam dge ba'i don du bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:306b-9: gsang sngags kyi tshul sku la dmigs pa 'di gsum yang /
T02TD2688E:306b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:306b-11: sangs rgyas thub pa rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD2688E:306b-13: mtshan dpe du mas spras pa'i sku //
T02TD2688E:306b-15: yang na phyag brgyad pa yang rung //
T02TD2688E:306b-16: rang gi lus ngag yid gnas na //
T02TD2688E:306b-17: bsams nas de dang de dag tu //
T02TD2688E:306b-18: dmigs pa gtad nas sngags brjod pas //
T02TD2688E:306b-19: nad dang sdug bsngal tsha ba dang //
T02TD2688E:306b-20: 'jigs dang phongs dang dbul ba dang //
T02TD2688E:306b-21: tshe la gnod byed la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2688E:306b-22: gdon dang bar chad thams cad sel //
T02TD2688E:306b-23: yang dang yang du goms pas ni //
T02TD2688E:306b-25: rig sngags byang chub sems dpa' yang //
T02TD2688E:306b-26: skye ba du mas dpag nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:306b-27: sangs rgyas zhing khams sbyangs byas te //
T02TD2688E:306b-28: dag pa'i zhing rnams rnam 'phrul gyi //
T02TD2688E:306b-29: sku yi 'du byed du mas ni //
T02TD2688E:306b-30: gdul bya tshim par mdzad par 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:307a-0: @307a * // rmi lam lta bur kun du shes so zhes pa dngos grub kyi rtags tha ma rmi lam du 'byung ba yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-1: tshes brgyad la sogs pa'i dus khyad par can du bsgrub pa phan yon dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-2: bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas la sogs pa ni shi ba la phan gdags pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-3: de yang shi ba la gnyis te /
T02TD2688E:307a-6: dang po la ro med pa dang /
T02TD2688E:307a-8: de la ro med pa ni ming dang bcas pa'i sngags brjod cing bden pa dang smon lam gdab pa'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-9: ro'i rus pa'am gos la sogs pa yod pa la ni yungs kar dang bye ma la sngags brjod cing gtor pa'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-10: sar pa la ni bdun tshigs bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-11: bdun tshigs su bya ba la 'di ltar rten ro yod pa dang med pa'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-12: gal te ro yod na dang por cho ga tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bum pa'i chu snga nas yod dam 'phral du bsgrubs kyang rung ste /
T02TD2688E:307a-13: spos lnga dang bcas pas ro la snying po'i sngags brjod cing ro khrus bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307a-14: de nas gro ga'am ras la sogs pa'i gzhi la gur gum dang gi wang gis snying po'i sngags bris la ro'i snying gar gdags so //
T02TD2688E:307a-15: sarba ta th'a ga ta s'urya gu hya aadhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-21: pun+yum bi lo ki te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-23: pun+yuma a'a ba lo ki te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-27: y'a ma da ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-29: ya ma d'u te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-31: sam gha ra ni sv'a h'a //
T02TD2688E:307a-33: sam bha ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-35: san dh'a ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-37: pra ti sa ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-39: aom dzo bi ta sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-41: te dzo ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-43: dza ya ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-45: sarba ta th'a ga ta mu dra aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:307a-47: yang sngags ring thung gnyis ka spyi bor gdags so //
T02TD2688E:307a-50: rna ba g-yas su sam h'um /
T02TD2688E:307b-1: sngags thams cad yig 'bru gsal bar bri'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-2: rgyan du ma yang ro la gdags so //
T02TD2688E:307b-3: gal te ro med na yang shing stag ma la shi ba'i gzugs bris nas yi ge de ltar dgod do //
T02TD2688E:307b-4: de nas ro yod na snod kyi nang du gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:307b-5: rdo'am sa 'am shing ngam 'byor na zangs sam dngul lam gser las brdungs la bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-6: de yang rab tu byung ba la dkar po mchod rten gyi dbyibs so //
T02TD2688E:307b-7: dge bsnyen la ni padma dmar po kha sbyar gyi gzugs so //
T02TD2688E:307b-8: rgyal po la ni sngon po gtsug tor lta bu'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-9: blon po la ni dmar skya za ma tog lta bu'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-10: tha mal pa pho la ni ser skya gdan khri lta bu'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-11: mo la sngo skya bil ba'i 'bras bu lta bu'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-12: byis ba la ni lhung bzed ltar dmar ser byas nas phyogs thams cad du rlung mi thar bar 'jam zhing dbyibs legs par bzos nas de'i kha nas nang du bzhag ste /
T02TD2688E:307b-13: dri bzang po du ma bsgos pa'i ras dkar pos dkris nas ro'i kha ni lhor bstan mgo ni nub tu bstan nas cung zad bslangs te rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:307b-14: ro'i spyi bo'am snying ga nas gzungs thag srad bu dmar po zhig btags la sgrom gyi nub phyogs su drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-15: sgrom de'i steng du gdugs khra bo zhig dbub par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-16: sgrom gyi phyogs bzhir rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa mkho ba'i yo byad du ma 'dra 'bag tu byas nas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-17: gzhan yol ba na dkar po'am yang na dmar pos bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-18: gzhan yang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang bla re dang lhub lhub dang lda ldi dang chun 'phyad du ma yang ci 'byor ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:307b-19: gzhan yang 'bras chan dang thug pa dang khur ba dang zan dron dang 'bras dang khre dang ci tse dang gro dang mon sran dang rgya sran dang nas la sogs pa'i 'bru thams cad las kha zas legs par bshams nas snod mdzes pa du ma'i nang du bzhag go //
T02TD2688E:307b-20: gzhan yang yon cha ba dang bdug spos dang me tog dang phreng ba dang mar me dang byug pa dang zhal zas dang 'dzam bu ti ba dang bu ram dang ka ra shing thog sna tshogs dang sha btsos dang nya sha dang tshod ma du ma yang phyogs re rer dgram mo //
T02TD2688E:308a-0: sil snyan gyi phreng ba yang bri bar @308a * //
T02TD2688E:308a-2: / gal te ma 'byor pa thams cad ni rdo la sogs pa'i snod rgyan med do //
T02TD2688E:308a-4: rab kyis ni rin po che las byas pa'am rin po che'i phra btab pa'o //
T02TD2688E:308a-5: da ni cho ga yang gang zag gcig gis gzungs sngags tsam brjod cing mandala la me tog bkram nas bum pa gcig dang s'atstsha gcig byas te 'og nas 'chad pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:308a-6: 'byor pa 'bring gis mandala khru gang bar me tog bkram nas s'atstsha lnga dang bum pa lnga dang gzungs dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo phran gcig bklag cing 'og nas 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang bden pa brjod pa dang smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:308a-7: thun mtshams zhag grangs ni mthun no //
T02TD2688E:308a-8: 'byor pa rab kyis ni ro dang ro'i snod brgyan cing ro bcug nas /
T02TD2688E:308a-9: ro'i lho phyogs su sa legs par bstar ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi nas bcu drug gi bar du ci rigs par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:308a-10: khru bzhi pa mtho gang nas khru gang gi bar du brtsig par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:308a-11: de la mkhas pas thig 'di ltar gdab bo //
T02TD2688E:308a-12: tshangs thig zur ngos legs btab nas //
T02TD2688E:308a-13: zur bzhi lo ma gdab par bya //
T02TD2688E:308a-14: cha chen bzhi ru 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2688E:308a-15: de nas gsum gsum bgos nas ni ;
T02TD2688E:308a-16: / cha chen bcu gnyis 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2688E:308a-17: de nas gnyis su bgos nas ni //
T02TD2688E:308a-18: cha chen nyi shu bzhi ru 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:308a-19: de nas cha phran bgos nas ni //
T02TD2688E:308a-20: tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis kyi //
T02TD2688E:308a-21: cha chen dang po'i phyed du bgo //
T02TD2688E:308a-22: phyi yi cha phyed de bzhin bgo //
T02TD2688E:308a-23: cha chen gnyis pa'ang phyed du bgo //
T02TD2688E:308a-24: nang gi cha phyed de bzhin bgo //
T02TD2688E:308a-25: cha chen gsum pa'i mtha' la gcig / cha chen bzhi pa'i phyi nang gi //
T02TD2688E:308a-26: cha re btab cing lnga pa phyed //
T02TD2688E:308a-27: cha chen drug pa lha snam 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:308a-28: cha chen bdun pa phyi nang gi //
T02TD2688E:308a-29: cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis bzhag / cha chen brgyad pa phyed du bgo //
T02TD2688E:308a-30: cha chen dgu pa bzhin du bgo //
T02TD2688E:308a-31: cha chen bcu pa phyi nang gi //
T02TD2688E:308a-32: cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis gzhag / cha chen bcu gcig phyed du bgo //
T02TD2688E:308a-33: cha chen bcu gnyis khor yug 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:308a-34: phyogs gsum du'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD2688E:308a-35: sgo gcig byed na tshangs thig dang //
T02TD2688E:308b-0: / phyogs gcig zur thig gdab @308b byas nas /
T02TD2688E:308b-1: tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis su //
T02TD2688E:308b-2: cha chen lnga lngar bgo byas nas //
T02TD2688E:308b-3: cha chen bcu ru 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2688E:308b-4: de nas gnyis su bgo byas nas //
T02TD2688E:308b-5: cha chen nyi shur 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2688E:308b-6: de nas cha phran bgo bar bya //
T02TD2688E:308b-7: tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis kyi //
T02TD2688E:308b-8: cha chen dang po phyed du bgo ;
T02TD2688E:308b-9: / phyi yi cha phyed de bzhin bgo //
T02TD2688E:308b-10: cha chen gnyis ni phyed du bgo //
T02TD2688E:308b-11: nang gi cha phyed de bzhin bgo //
T02TD2688E:308b-12: cha chen gsum pa'i mthar cha gcig / cha chen bzhi pa lha snam 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:308b-13: cha chen lnga pa phyi nang gi //
T02TD2688E:308b-14: cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis gzhag / cha chen drug pa phyed du bgo / cha chen bdun pa bzhi ru bgo //
T02TD2688E:308b-15: cha chen brgyad pa phyi nang gi //
T02TD2688E:308b-16: cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis gzhag / cha chen dgu pa phyed du bgo / de la bskor ba rim gnyis bya //
T02TD2688E:308b-17: gsum pa mtha' yi cha phran skor //
T02TD2688E:308b-18: cha chen bcu pa khor yug 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:308b-19: sgo gsum pa sogs byed 'dod na ;
T02TD2688E:308b-20: / phyi nang dkyil 'khor gang yin pa'i //
T02TD2688E:308b-21: tshad kyi rim pas bya ba ni //
T02TD2688E:308b-22: cha phran dbri dang bsnan par bya /
T02TD2688E:308b-23: de nas blo dang ldan bas tshon sna ma lus pas /
T02TD2688E:308b-24: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rim pa gnyis sam yang na rim pa gcig kho na bri'o //
T02TD2688E:308b-25: der sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor lha gang mos pa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:308b-26: gal te rim pa gnyis bris na bar khyams la 'jig rten skyong pa bcu dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:308b-28: brgya byin dkar po rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2688E:308b-29: me lha dmar po me thab 'chang //
T02TD2688E:308b-30: gshin rje sngon po ben con 'chang //
T02TD2688E:308b-31: bden bral sngo skya ral gri 'chang//
T02TD2688E:308b-32: chu bdag dkar po zhags pa 'chang //
T02TD2688E:308b-33: rlung lha ljang ser ba dan 'dzin //
T02TD2688E:308b-34: gdod sbyin ljang sngon dbyug pa 'chang //
T02TD2688E:308b-35: dbang phyug ljang skya rtse gsum 'dzin //
T02TD2688E:308b-36: sa bdag mo ni bum ljang ser //
T02TD2688E:308b-37: nyi zla tshangs pa dkar ser ni //
T02TD2688E:308b-39: lha de dag gi sngags sam phyag rgya'am sku dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:308b-40: gzhan yang gong du bshad pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:308b-43: de nas sngon gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste /
T02TD2688E:309a-1: dang gnyis su med par byas nas mchod bstod nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD2688E:309a-2: dkyil 'khor gtso bo la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2688E:309a-3: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2688E:309a-4: kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2688E:309a-5: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02TD2688E:309a-8: yo byad ci 'byor pa dag gis //
T02TD2688E:309a-9: gus pas khyod la mchod byed na //
T02TD2688E:309a-10: snying brtser dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2688E:309a-11: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba la mchod cing gtor ma phul nas tshe 'das pa'i don du cho ga byed pa la bar du gcod pa sol cig ces gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD2688E:309a-12: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i khro bo chen po rnams la yang mchod pa dang gtor ma phul te /
T02TD2688E:309a-13: de bzhin du gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD2688E:309a-14: dkyil 'khor de dang 'brel par lho phyogs su ni s'a tstsha brgya rtsa brgyad bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'brel par gzungs kyi cho gas sngags brjod do //
T02TD2688E:309a-15: shar phyogs su ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag go //
T02TD2688E:309a-16: nub phyogs su ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sna tshogs pa ji snyed ci nus pa bklag go //
T02TD2688E:309a-17: byang phyogs su ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo bklag go //
T02TD2688E:309a-18: de'i tshe slob dpon la sogs pa thams cad kyis rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas mdun du gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor dmigs nas bklag pa dang sngags brjod de bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha bskul nas lha'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis khams gsum thams cad khyab nas khyad par du bsgrub bya la phog pas sngon gyi rnam par smin pa'i lus gsal bar bltas nas bsgrub bya de'i bshad lam du yi ge du nag po cig bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:309a-19: yi ge du de'i 'od kyis sa 'og stong phrag nyi shu zhabs su gsal bar byas nas bsgrub bya de'i dbang po'i spyod yul du dmyal khams bcu drug gsal bar bya bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:309a-20: de nas bsgrub bya de shin tu 'gyod cing 'dar nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te sngon du spyad pa'i sdig pa'i las thams cad dran nas 'gyod cing smre sngags 'don cing bshags par bsams la /
T02TD2688E:309b-0: skabs 'dir las @309b kyi slob dpon gyis ro de la khrus byas bden pa'i tshigs bcad kyis dug bsal par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:309b-1: de la tshigs bcad 'di yang brjod do //
T02TD2688E:309b-2: 'jig rten 'di'am 'jig rten la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams ci rigs par bsgyur cing brjod par bya'o skabs der bsgrub bya thal mo sbyar nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing phyag 'tshal bar bsams shing gnyen 'dun zhig gis tshul kho na ltar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:309b-3: slob dpon gyis kyang sngags aa mogha bi ma le a'a karsha ya zhes pa'i skabs su aa mo gha'i skabs su bsgrub bya'i ming bcug nas brjod do //
T02TD2688E:309b-4: des dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi thugs ka'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i bshang sgo'i yi ge du nag po la phog pas rked pa yan chad ni sdig pa'i gzugs rked pa man chad ni mi'i gzugs shig bud nas gzugs de nyid de 'dra ba du mar gur nas dmyal ba bcu drug gi gnas khang khengs par song par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:309b-5: lus 'di ni lha dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis sbyangs bas sngon gyi gzugs byad las shin tu mdangs bzang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:309b-6: aam bam sam dzam che ge mo na ra ka sya sarba karma pa ri shodha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:309b-8: thun mtshams su ni slob dpon nyid kyis dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te sngags tshar brgyad bklag pa'i tshe ni che ge mo moksha tha la prapta kurbantu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:309b-9: zhes brjod nas smon lam 'di yang gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:309b-10: 'di zhes bya ba rigs kyi bu /
T02TD2688E:309b-11: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi ;
T02TD2688E:309b-12: / sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2688E:309b-13: rig sngags gsang sngags gzungs sngags dang //
T02TD2688E:309b-14: snying po phyag rgya'i bden pa dang //
T02TD2688E:309b-15: gzhan yang bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2688E:309b-16: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myur zhi nas //
T02TD2688E:309b-17: bde ba'i zhing du myur skye shog / ces lan gsum brjod ;
T02TD2688E:309b-18: / gzhan yang smon lam du ma yang brjod do //
T02TD2688E:309b-19: de nas lcags snod kyi nang du du ba med ba'i me la til nag po bsreg cing aom che ge mo sarba p'a pam da ha na sarba bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bsreg go //
T02TD2688E:310a-0: de nas bum pa'i chus khrus byas yungs kar dang bye ma la dri ma med pa'i @310a * //
T02TD2688E:310a-1: snying po brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas ro'am ro'i snod brab par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310a-2: de'i 'og tu sil snyan du ma dkrol zhing bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa du ma brjod do //
T02TD2688E:310a-3: de nas dkon mchog gi mchod pa dang dge slong dang ston pa dang nang du yang dag 'jog la ston mo drang ngo //
T02TD2688E:310a-4: de'i 'og tu byis pa dang dud 'gro la yang ci rigs pa'i zas sbyin te de thams cad la /
T02TD2688E:310a-5: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te aom sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um zhes lag pa g-yas pas mchog stsol ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bdun brjod de stsal to //
T02TD2688E:310a-6: de nas sngags 'di tshar gsum brjod do //
T02TD2688E:310a-7: aom badzra satva sa ma ya //
T02TD2688E:310a-9: badzra sa tva tve no pa /
T02TD2688E:310a-10: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2688E:310a-11: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2688E:310a-12: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2688E:310a-13: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2688E:310a-17: ha ha ha ha ho:bha ga w'an /
T02TD2688E:310a-18: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa bidzr'a bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: / de ltar sngags 'don pa dang gsung rab bklag pa rgyun mi chad par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:310a-19: sdom pa dang ldan pa'am skabs su sdom pa blangs kyang rung ldan par byas nas gsum mam bzhi la sogs pa'i bar du mi tshig gis bar mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310a-20: 'di ni zhag bdun phrag dang po dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dag pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310a-21: tshigs gnyis pa la ni bsgrub bya'i lte bar yi ge tr'am sngon po bsams la ba ri shodha ya sv'a h'a zhes pa dang bcas pa'i sngags brjod pa'i tshe lha dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la phog pas bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i tr'am yig las dud 'gro sna tshogs mgo yod pa ste /
T02TD2688E:310a-22: mgo bye ba la yan lag bye ba dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2688E:310a-23: sked pa yan chad sbal pa sdo nag rked pa man chad mi sngo nag zhig bud nas gzugs de 'dra ba du mar gyur te mtha'i rgya mtsho'i nang du song bas rgya mtsho khengs shing der yang 'gyod pa drag pos gnas so //
T02TD2688E:310a-24: lus 'di ni sngon gyi bas gzugs bzang por gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:310a-25: bden pa brjod pa dang smon lam gyi skabs thams cad du dud 'gro'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310a-26: lhag ma thams cad sngon ltar ro //
T02TD2688E:310b-0: 'di ni zhag bdun phrag gnyis la byol @310b song gi 'jig rten dag pa 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310b-1: tshigs gsum pa la ni bsgrub bya'i gsang gnas su yi ge pre ser po bsams la /
T02TD2688E:310b-2: lha dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la phog nas gnas gsum gyi sgrub pa thams cad yi ge pre la bsdus nas de las mi'i gzugs shin tu rid cing yan lag dang ske rab tu phra ba /
T02TD2688E:310b-5: kha gdangs pa bud nas sa 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya'i zhabs su gzugs du mar gyur nas sa 'og sa stengs thams cad khyab par gyur cing sngon gyi las la yang 'gyod par bsam mo ;
T02TD2688E:310b-6: / pre ta sarba karma a'a ba ra na pa ri sho dha ya sv'a h'a dang bcas pa brjod cing bden pa brjod pa dang smon lam gyi skabs su yang ming 'di zhes bya ba yi dags kyi 'jig rten las thar bar gyur cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2688E:310b-7: lhag ma thams cad sngon ltar ro //
T02TD2688E:310b-8: 'di ni zhag bdun phrag gsum pa'i yi dags kyi 'jig rten dag pa 'phags pa kun du bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310b-9: tshigs bzhi pa la bsgrub bya'i kha'i nang du sum yig ljang gu bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:310b-10: lha dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la phog nas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa thams cad sum yig la bsdus nas lha ma yin gyi gzugs ni ljang sngon skra ser ba mche ba bzhi pa mig dmar ser zur gsum pa /
T02TD2688E:310b-12: sen mo ring zhing lce 'dril ba bud nas lus du mar gyur te /
T02TD2688E:310b-13: ri rab kyi rtse dang ri bdun gyi ngos dang 'dzam bu'i gling khyab par rgyu zhing sngon gyi las ngan pa thams cad la 'gyod par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:310b-14: de'i tshe rnam smin gyi lus 'di nyid skrag nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa bzung nas sngon gyi bas gzugs byad bzang por gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:310b-15: che ge mo a'a yu:sarba a'a ba ra na pa ri sho dha ya sv'a h'a brjod cing bden pa brjod pa dang smon lam gyi skabs su lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa las thar bar gyur cig ces yang dang yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310b-16: 'di ni zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dag pa sa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:310b-17: tshigs lnga pa la bsgrub bya'i snying gar ni yig ser skya bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311a-1: dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa ni la bsdus pas mi'i gzugs ser skya bud de lus snga ma las mar me las mar me chad pa ltar ro //
T02TD2688E:311a-2: lus de sngon gyi las la 'gyod cing 'dzam bu'i gling khyad par nyul bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311a-3: rnam smin gyi lus snga ma ni gzugs byad bzang bar gyur nas 'od zer gyis reg pa'i mthus gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2688E:311a-4: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bsams nas gang nye dus lan brjod cing sdom pa gsum gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:311a-5: che ge mo sarba ma nushya a'a ba ra na pa ri shodha ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod cing bden pa brjod pa dang smon lam gyi skabs su mi'i gnas kyi sdug bsngal zad par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:311a-6: 'di ni zhag bdun phrag lnga pa mi'i 'jig rten dag pa nam mkha'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:311a-7: tshigs drug pa'i bsgrub bya'i spyi bor yi ge aa dkar po bsams nas lha dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas yi ge aa la bsdus pas padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i lha'i bu shin tu dkar zhing dal bar gyur te mgon po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa stsal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsung bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311a-8: rnam par smin pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang /
T02TD2688E:311a-9: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig gnod par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311a-10: bden pa brjod pa dang smon lam gyi skabs su yang 'dod pa'i lha rnam par g-yeng ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar gyur cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2688E:311a-11: che ge mo sarba de ba a'a ba ra na pa ri sho dha ya sva h'a zhes pa la sogs pa lhag ma sngar ltar ro //
T02TD2688E:311a-12: 'di ni zhag bdun phrag drug pa lha'i 'jig rten pa 'phags pa byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:311a-13: tshigs bdun pa la bsgrub bya'i mdzod spur yi ge aom dkar po bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311b-0: lha dang sngags kyi 'od zer gyi rtse mor lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo bum pa thogs pa du ma byung bas bsgrub bya'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas sgrib pa dag pas spyi bor sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs par bsam zhing 'og min gyi rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa'i @311b sku'i 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya rnam par snang mdzad dang bcas pa la phog pa tsam gyis bsgrub bya'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rnam par gyur nas /
T02TD2688E:311b-1: a'a li dang k'a li'i phreng ba dkar po gsal bar dmigs so //
T02TD2688E:311b-2: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bo dhi tsitta pra ti bya dham n'am ka ro mi zhes phyogs bcu na bsgrags pa'i de ma thag tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba'i steng du h'um yig dkar po'i 'od kyi sa sprul shun pa ba rjes pa ltar khog pa 'dir gzhag nas /
T02TD2688E:311b-3: khog pa'i nang nas rnam smin gyi lus dang 'dra ba zhig 'od zer gyis khrid nas padma'i gnas chen po'i drung du 'khod pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis aom sarba ta th'a ga ta yasth'a aa ham zhes gsungs pa tsam gyis snying ga'i zla ba'i steng du rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa'i rnam par snang ngo //
T02TD2688E:311b-4: de'i shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams du ma nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad byon nas /
T02TD2688E:311b-5: kye rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod cing rin po che'i bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu du mas dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311b-6: lho phyogs pa thams cad kyis rin po cha'i dbu rgyan gzhag par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311b-7: nub phyogs pa thams cad kyis lag tu rdo rje gtad pa dang /
T02TD2688E:311b-8: byang phyogs pas dril bu gtad pa dang /
T02TD2688E:311b-9: zhing 'di nyid kyi rnam par snang mdzad chen pos me tog gi phreng ba dbu la bzhag pa'i de ma thag tu sku mdog dkar po //
T02TD2688E:311b-11: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can zhabs bzhi sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs par gyur nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par snang mdzad chen po zhes brjod par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:311b-12: bden pa dang smon lam brjod pa thams cad kyi mthar yang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar gyur cig ces brjod cing sngags kyi mthar yang sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2688E:311b-14: /'di thun mtshams thams cad du rig pa'i dbang bskur zhing zhag bdun gyi mthar rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes mtshan btags par bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:312a-0: tshigs tha ma gsum po 'di dag gi tshe lam sbyang ba dang lam bstan @312a * //
T02TD2688E:312a-1: pa thun mtshams thams cad du bya'o //
T02TD2688E:312a-2: de ltar tshigs bdun phrag gi rjes su sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2688E:312a-3: de yang lha'i grong khyer du bsams nas /
T02TD2688E:312a-5: yang na thab tu lha'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ro la zhal zas su byin gyis brlabs nas bsregs te thal bar gyur pa dang rus pa'i thal ba de brdungs nas sngon ltar satstsha'i cho ga 'bi 'bi'i nang du bcug na sa tsha tsha bya'o //
T02TD2688E:312a-6: tsha tsha de dag kyang sngon gyi cho gas byas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du'am yang na chu bo chen po'i 'gram du gzhag go //
T02TD2688E:312a-7: ro bsreg pa'i cho ga yang gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:312a-8: 'di ltar cho ga 'di'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon gyis ra bar gtor na phyugs nad med par byed do //
T02TD2688E:312a-9: yang thog dang tshad mang dang nyal sar gtor na mig nad la sogs pa sel to //
T02TD2688E:312a-10: zhing la gtor na 'bu dang rtsa dang sad dang ser ba dang myags pa dang bskams pa thams cad med par byed do //
T02TD2688E:312a-11: 'di ni zhag bdun phrag bdun pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag pa sgrib pa rnam sel gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:312a-12: de ltar bdun tshigs kyi tshul de yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:312a-13: dge bas ngan 'gro las grol zhing //
T02TD2688E:312a-14: shes rab kyis ni byang chub thob //
T02TD2688E:312a-15: phun sum tshogs gang sngon byas nas //
T02TD2688E:312a-16: de bzhin nyid rtogs sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:312a-17: lam rgyu bzang zhing gson tshe la //
T02TD2688E:312a-18: dge spyod shin tu drag pa ni //
T02TD2688E:312a-19: mtho ris sam ni thar par nges //
T02TD2688E:312a-20: de la bar do ma mchis so //
T02TD2688E:312a-21: lam rgyud dman zhing tshe 'dir yang //
T02TD2688E:312a-22: ngan spyod shin tu mang po rnams //
T02TD2688E:312a-23: lha mi dman dang ngan 'gror nges //
T02TD2688E:312a-24: de nyid nam yang bar do med //
T02TD2688E:312a-25: las rgyu sna tshogs snang mod kyang //
T02TD2688E:312a-26: dge la spro zhing mi dge spang //
T02TD2688E:312a-27: cung zad spyod pa'i ming gang de //
T02TD2688E:312a-28: bar do de la yod mod kyang //
T02TD2688E:312a-29: bdun phrag gcig sogs bdun gyi mtha' //
T02TD2688E:312a-30: de las lhag par mi gnas lags //
T02TD2688E:312a-31: mi yi zhag bdun bar do'i tshe //
T02TD2688E:312a-32: de yi bar do yud tsam bdun //
T02TD2688E:312a-33: shi ba'i rjes su dge spyod na //
T02TD2688E:312a-34: bar do bde zhing skye ba yang //
T02TD2688E:312a-35: bzang po de ma thag tu 'gro //
T02TD2688E:312a-36: skye ba gzhan du bde spyod 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:312a-37: shi ba'i rjes su ngan spyod na //
T02TD2688E:312b-0: bar do sdug bsngal skye gzhan @312b du ;
T02TD2688E:312b-1: / dman par skya zhing ngan spyod 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:312b-2: brtse ba can gyis shin tu spang //
T02TD2688E:312b-6: dpal dang 'byor pa kun byed de //
T02TD2688E:312b-7: shi ba'i don du brjod pa'am //
T02TD2688E:312b-8: yang na zhag grangs bdun phrag bdun //
T02TD2688E:312b-9: dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha mchod phyir //
T02TD2688E:312b-10: bum pa tsha tsha dang 'brel cig /'gro gnas sdig pa kun sel bya //
T02TD2688E:312b-11: sngags dang lha yi gzhi brjid kyis //
T02TD2688E:312b-12: mi dge'i las rnams 'gro gzugs su //
T02TD2688E:312b-13: rnam smin lus la byung nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:312b-14: rang rig gnas su song bar dmigs //
T02TD2688E:312b-15: 'gro ba drug gi dug bsal nas //
T02TD2688E:312b-16: mthar ni thar pa'i lam gzhag phyir //
T02TD2688E:312b-18: sangs rgyas zhing du bzhag nas kyang //
T02TD2688E:312b-19: thub rnams de la dbang bskur mdzad //
T02TD2688E:312b-20: rnam dag sangs rgyas skur gyur nas //
T02TD2688E:312b-21: mtshan yang che ge rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD2688E:312b-22: ces pa la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:312b-23: gzhan yang mchod rten mang zhabs su shi ba po'i bar du gcod pa thams cad kyi ming bris nas rdza sar pa'i bum par bcug la bzhag go //
T02TD2688E:312b-24: mchod rten dang tsha tsha'i chu ji srid pa ni shi ba po'i ro'am rus pa'am gos bkrus pa'i chus bya'o //
T02TD2688E:312b-25: bum pa'i nang gi steng gi khri la yang shi ba po'i rten bzhag go //
T02TD2688E:312b-26: yang na tsha tsha'i dus su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo bklags pa'i drung du rus pa gzungs sngags kyi chus khrus byas nas snying po bris pa dkris te tsha tsha'i nang du gzhug go //
T02TD2688E:312b-27: de nas tsha tsha brgya rtsa brgyad re re zhing dkyil 'khor bris nas bum pa gang ba dang bcas pa mchod cing gzungs sngags brjod do //
T02TD2688E:312b-28: de'i tshe dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad kyis bsgrub bya de dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:312b-29: gzungs kyi cho ga tshar ba dang bsgrub bya'i rten de la khrus bya'o //
T02TD2688E:312b-32: gzugs brnyan stong khrus kyis dag par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:312b-33: cho ga'i tshul de dang ldan pa'i tsha tsha stong gis ni bsgrub bya de lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:312b-34: khris ni mtha' bral gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:312b-35: 'bum gyis ni dga' ldan gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:312b-36: sa yas ni 'phrul dga'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:313a-1: 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:313a-2: de'i 'og tu gzungs kyi sgo 'bum phrag la mnga' brnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:313a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:313a-4: zhing 'bum phrag mtha' yas pa sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:313a-5: cho ga lhag ma ni sngar ltar bya'o//
T02TD2688E:313a-6: shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2688E:313a-8: // / gcan gzan dang la sogs pa ni rgyu de phan gdags pa'o //
T02TD2688E:313a-9: kun nas sgor 'jug pa la sogs pas ni bzlas pa'i grangs gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:313a-10: lan stong ni shi ba la phan gdags pa'i bzlas brjod kyi grangs so //
T02TD2688E:313a-11: khri ni 'chi ba slu ba'i tshes brgyad nas nya'i bar du dge slong la sogs pa gang zag bcus byed pa'i grangs so //
T02TD2688E:313a-12: 'bum ni bsnyen pa'i bzlas brjod kyi grangs so //
T02TD2688E:313a-13: 'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ces pa ni snying po 'ba' zhig gur gum dang gi wang dang tsandan la sogs pas sngon bzhin bris nas tsha tsha'i nang du bcug pa'o //
T02TD2688E:313a-14: 'bum tshang nas mchod rten chen po cig gi nang du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng zhing rgyan btags nas mchod do zhes pa ni 'bum gter chen po'i ring bsrel lo //
T02TD2688E:313a-15: de la mchod rten gyi rim pa ni /
T02TD2688E:313a-16: ri'am thang ngam ljongs gang dag / dur khrod la sogs spangs pa yi //
T02TD2688E:313a-17: yid 'ong gnas su rgyal ba yi //
T02TD2688E:313a-18: sku gdung mchod rten brtsig par bya //
T02TD2688E:313a-19: yang na sa'am rdo dag la //
T02TD2688E:313a-20: mkhas pas tshul bzhin brko bar bya //
T02TD2688E:313a-22: yang na tshogs pas brtsig par bya //
T02TD2688E:313a-23: de la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni khri 'phang bcu gsum yan chad //
T02TD2688E:313a-24: sum cu rtsa gnyis man chad do //
T02TD2688E:313a-25: rang sangs rgyas kyi dgu yan chad bcu gcig man chad de /
T02TD2688E:313a-26: char kheb dang tog kyang med do //
T02TD2688E:313a-27: dgra bcom pa'i khri 'phang bzhi yan chad do //
T02TD2688E:313a-29: rgyun du zhugs pa nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i bar gyi khri 'phang gsum kho na'o //
T02TD2688E:313a-31: so so'i skye bo'i khri 'phang gnyis 'khor lo bzhi'o //
T02TD2688E:313b-0: de las sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung cha brgyad du bgos pa'i mchod rten chen po brgyad ni grong khyer ser skyar rgyal po zas gtsang gis yon bdag byas nas dpal lha las babs @313b pa'i mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-1: yul ma ga dh'a dbus 'gyur tshal du rgyal po ma skyes dgras yon bdag byas nas byang chub chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-2: grong khyer rtsa mchog tu gyad rnams kyis yon bdag byas nas cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-3: yul b'a r'a na s'i du ser skya'i rgyal po tshangs byin gyis yon bdag byas nas dpal chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-4: yul yangs pa can du rgyal po li tsa byi gzhon nus yon bdag byas nas dpal ka ni ka'i mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-5: yul mnyan yod du rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis yon bdag byas nas dpal bkra shis sgo mangs brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-6: yul chad ger rgyal po bdun 'dzin ta las yon bdag byas nas dpal 'od can gyi mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-7: yul ti ka tsa shir rgyal po aindra ba mis yon bdag byas nas mchod rten padma can brtsigs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-8: slan chad kyang de dag gi rjes su 'brangs te brtsig par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:313b-9: de la byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyi tshul du brtsigs na /
T02TD2688E:313b-10: sku gdung gi rmang yod na rmang rten ji ltar mtho ba bzang po rten med na bang rim dang po'i sum cha'i tshad do //
T02TD2688E:313b-11: de'i steng du dge bcu ni phyir bskyed pa dang rngams bang rim dang po'i rngams phyed do //
T02TD2688E:313b-12: gnam 'phang phyi la bang rim dang po'i ngos tshad do //
T02TD2688E:313b-13: de yan chad srog shing ste bang rim dang po'i gzhi gsum gyi tshad do //
T02TD2688E:313b-15: bang rim rngams kyi phyir tshad khri 'phang ngo //
T02TD2688E:313b-16: bum rten khri 'phang gi phyed tshad do //
T02TD2688E:313b-17: bum pa ni bang rim dang po'i sum gnyis kyi tshad do //
T02TD2688E:313b-18: stod kyi sked ni bang rim gsum pa dang mnyam mo //
T02TD2688E:313b-19: bre rten gyi rgya ni bang rim bzhi pa'i lnga cha gcig go //
T02TD2688E:313b-20: bre ni bang rim bzhi ba'i bzhi cha gcig go //
T02TD2688E:313b-21: de gnyis ka'i 'phang ni bang rim gyi sum gnyis dang bang rim gyi phyed do //
T02TD2688E:313b-22: bang rim bzhi pa'i shar dang lhor gsal khung bang rim nyid kyi brgyad cha'o //
T02TD2688E:313b-23: srog shing gi rtsa ba bang rim bzhi pa la reg go //
T02TD2688E:313b-24: 'khor lo bcu gsum gyi 'phang du bang rim dang po'i bzhi gsum gyi tshad do //
T02TD2688E:313b-25: 'khor lo dang po ni bre'i zur bzhi la slebs so //
T02TD2688E:313b-26: de bzhi chas 'khor ba'i tshad ni 'khor lo bcu gsum pa'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-0: @314a * // bcu gcig po yang de'i rim gyis gzhol pa'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-1: rtseg par thams cad ni ci mdzes su bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-2: thugs rjes mdo gzungs 'phang lo chung ba dang mnyam mo //
T02TD2688E:314a-3: de'i rmad du rngams kyi gzhi gsum ni 'jam po nyid stod du bzhi cha gcig ni phreng ba'i sul bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-4: de'i steng du 'khor lo bcu gsum pa nyid kyi shing gi phyed tshad yar rtse phra ba bang rim nyid kyi 'phang phyed do //
T02TD2688E:314a-5: yang srog shing 'phang du bre phyed tsam steng du zla ba'i rtse mo gdugs dang mnyam srog shing la bskor te rtse mo bgrad do //
T02TD2688E:314a-6: gdugs ni 'khor lo bdun pa dang mnyam mo //
T02TD2688E:314a-7: gdugs khebs 'khor lo drug pa dang mnyam mo //
T02TD2688E:314a-8: za ra tshags ni bre'i 'phang dang mnyam mo //
T02TD2688E:314a-9: yang srog shing 'phang du bre'i sum cha'i tshad kyi steng du nyi ma zla ba las khyad yud tsam mo //
T02TD2688E:314a-10: nyi ma'i steng du rtog gi autpala ser po'i tog bu 'dra ste ci mdzes nyi ma dang zla ba dang tog pa thams cad kyi zur la bya mi chags par bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi thur ma rnon po gzer bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-11: tog ni ser po nyi ma ni dmar po //
T02TD2688E:314a-15: gdugs kyi phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya bri'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-16: thugs rje'i phul ni dmar po'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-17: thugs rje nyid dang shes rab bcu ni ser po'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-18: 'khor lo thams cad dang srog shing dmar po'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-21: rmang dang rmang rten ljang gu'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-22: mchod rten brtsig pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-23: da ni mchod rten gyi bum rten gyi steng du sngon nas gdung ma bzhi rgya gram du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-24: de ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:314a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zheng gi gzhi bri'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-26: de'i steng du rdo leb bam so btang ba'i so phag legs par gzhib bo //
T02TD2688E:314a-27: de'i steng du bkra shis pa'i sa rtsva munydza gtubs pa dang /
T02TD2688E:314a-28: bsres pa'i dri bzang po'i chus sbrus nas gro phye dang shing bal bskol bas bsre bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-29: rgya ji tsam yod pa'i bcu drug gam brgyad kyi cha ni 'phangs su bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-30: gnyer ma dang sgo 'phur med pa'i gru bzhi par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314a-31: de nas thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:314a-32: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyud las skyon med ras bal 'jam po ni //
T02TD2688E:314b-0: shin tu @314b gtsang ba'i bu mos ni //
T02TD2688E:314b-1: shar du bltas nas dgu bsgril du //
T02TD2688E:314b-2: sngags 'di brjod cing bkal bar bya //
T02TD2688E:314b-3: aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta /
T02TD2688E:314b-4: sarba dha rm'a spha ra sarba dha rm'a aa tyanta aa nu pra bishta sarba dha rm'a h'um /
T02TD2688E:314b-5: shar nub lho byang tshangs thig gdab //
T02TD2688E:314b-6: tshangs dang dngos dang gru chad gdab //
T02TD2688E:314b-7: nang gi phyed kyang phyed tshad gdab //
T02TD2688E:314b-8: rgyab tu phyed phyed tshad btab nas //
T02TD2688E:314b-9: lnga pa phyi nas cha re gdab //
T02TD2688E:314b-10: drug pa dbus dkar rgyab ma bkas //
T02TD2688E:314b-11: bzhi rgyab phyogs bzhir dbus cha bzhi //
T02TD2688E:314b-12: re re yang ni bzhi bzhir bgo //
T02TD2688E:314b-13: des ni sgo yi dkyil 'khor lo //
T02TD2688E:314b-14: pho brang ci bder bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314b-15: de'i rgyab tu cha gnyis kyang //
T02TD2688E:314b-16: phyed cha re rer bskor ba ni //
T02TD2688E:314b-18: mchod pa dgod pa'i sa gzhi ste //
T02TD2688E:314b-19: zhes pa'i tshul gyis thig btab nas sa tshon bkye bas gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs dang dra shar dang zla mdzes dang ba dan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa bri'o //
T02TD2688E:314b-20: phyi rol du ra ba rim pa gsum ni sna tshigs padma dang rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba dang dmar ser me 'od 'bar ba thams cad du zlum po drang ba'o //
T02TD2688E:314b-21: skyil 'khor de la lha'i rten dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:314b-22: sku'am tsa ga li'am phyag rgya'am ming yig kyang rung ste /
T02TD2688E:314b-23: tshon ma lus pas bris nas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:314b-24: de yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i brgyud las /
T02TD2688E:314b-25: phung po lnga dang bco brgyad khams //
T02TD2688E:314b-26: 'byung bzhir bcas pa'i lus kyis ni //
T02TD2688E:314b-28: mi de myur du grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:314b-30: de nas lus dkyil 'khor ci lta ba gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la'ang lha nyi shu rtsa bdun du nges so //
T02TD2688E:314b-31: de'ang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gtso bo yab yum la lha mo nyi shu rtsa drug gis bskor ba'o //
T02TD2688E:314b-32: rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa'o ;
T02TD2688E:314b-33: / gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor la lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo //
T02TD2688E:314b-34: 'on kyang nyi shu rtsa bdun de dag kyang phyogs dang kha dog gi bye brag gis lha re re yang bzhi bzhir 'gyur la de ltar na rigs 'dus pa'i lha brgya rtsa brgyad do //
T02TD2688E:315a-0: de nyi shu rtsa lngar 'du zhing dgu dang lnga dang gcig @315a * //
T02TD2688E:315a-2: de brgya rtsa brgyad kyi dbang du byas nas dbus su rnam par snang mdzad chen po zhal bzhi phyag brgyad zhabs brgyad pa yum dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2688E:315a-3: g-yas su nyi ma rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2688E:315a-4: g-yon du zla ba rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2688E:315a-5: g-yon du zla ba rnam par snang mdzad //
T02TD2688E:315a-6: shar du ming skyod pa la rigs bzhi dang spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2688E:315a-7: gzugs rdor rje la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2688E:315a-8: l'a skye la sogs pa bzhis bskor ba'o //
T02TD2688E:315a-9: de kho na bzhin du lho nub dang byang du yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:315a-10: de ni dbus kyi pho brang ngo //
T02TD2688E:315a-11: de yang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2688E:315a-12: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD2688E:315a-13: dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD2688E:315a-14: mdog skya byang chub mchog gi rgya //
T02TD2688E:315a-15: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad do //
T02TD2688E:315a-16: rig pa kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog / zla ba nyi ma rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD2688E:315a-18: phyogs bzhi pho brang dbus su ni //
T02TD2688E:315a-19: rdo rje rin chen padma'i rigs //
T02TD2688E:315a-20: las kyi rigs rnams so sor yang //
T02TD2688E:315a-21: rang rig sangs rgyas sras po dang //
T02TD2688E:315a-22: spyan ma bdag mo dgod dkar sgrol //
T02TD2688E:315a-23: gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo dang //
T02TD2688E:315a-24: sgeg mo gar phreng glu ma rnams //
T02TD2688E:315a-25: phyogs mdog rigs kyi phyag rgya can //
T02TD2688E:315a-26: g-yon pa rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang //
T02TD2688E:315a-27: ldem bag zhi ba'i tshul du bsam //
T02TD2688E:315a-30: byang chub sems dpa' sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2688E:315a-31: lha yi snam bur dgod par bya //
T02TD2688E:315a-32: rig pa'i lha mo khro mo che //
T02TD2688E:315a-33: mos pas sgo la dgod par bya //
T02TD2688E:315a-35: de yi rgyab tu lha rnams la //
T02TD2688E:315a-36: bskal bzang sems dpa' bcu drug go //
T02TD2688E:315a-37: sgo bzhir lha mo bzhi'am khro bo bzhi dbus kyi gtso bo la yang gzungs kyi tshul du sgrub pa la lha mo bzhi'o //
T02TD2688E:315a-38: rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshul du sgrub pa la rigs bzhi nyid do //
T02TD2688E:315a-39: yang dbus su rigs lnga mtshams su spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang pho brang gi dbus su gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2688E:315a-40: sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi'am yang na khro mo bzhi'o //
T02TD2688E:315a-41: sgo'i nang gi lha rnams la byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' zung re ste brgyad do //
T02TD2688E:315b-0: rten de dag bkod nas dkyil 'khor yol @315b ba dmar po dang bal re sngon pos bya'o //
T02TD2688E:315b-1: cod pan dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang gdugs la sogs pa ngos re re yang brgyad brgyad mngon par 'du bya ste legs par dgod /
T02TD2688E:315b-2: de'i steng du khri bcas nas yon gyi bdag po gang de'i gos la sogs pa dang gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya'o ;
T02TD2688E:315b-3: / de ni dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o //
T02TD2688E:315b-4: da ni dkyil 'khor de la mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2688E:315b-5: lha'i grangs kyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor de yongs su bskor nas sgrub pa po phyogs bzhir bzhugs te ji ltar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang par lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa skad cig gis dmigs nas rang bzhin gyis lha bcug ste /
T02TD2688E:315b-6: nam mkhar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom yig las 'phrul pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod par bsam zhing /
T02TD2688E:315b-7: gzhung gzhan du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad dang sngags du mas mchod cing bstod par bya'o ;
T02TD2688E:315b-8: / sil snyan du ma'i tshogs dkrol zhing bkra shis kyi glu du ma dang smon lam du ma brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:315b-10: rmi ngan 'jigs dang sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //
T02TD2688E:315b-11: tshe dang 'byor dang stobs dang bde ba rnam 'phel ba //
T02TD2688E:315b-12: khyed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'grub par byed 'di dag / rab tu brjod kyis de phyir mi rnam bsgrims te nyon //
T02TD2688E:315b-13: rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan //
T02TD2688E:315b-14: zla ba nyi 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin /
T02TD2688E:315b-15: dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02TD2688E:315b-16: bkra shis des reng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig / mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam spyod pa //
T02TD2688E:315b-17: mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin dang //
T02TD2688E:315b-18: dge ba nyams sems rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02TD2688E:315b-19: bkra shis des deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig / sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing //
T02TD2688E:315b-20: yang dag spyin mdzad 'gro ba'i don la mi slu ba'i //
T02TD2688E:315b-21: rin chen 'byung zhes bya'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02TD2688E:316a-0: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig / bsam gtan ting 'dzin dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i @316a * //
T02TD2688E:316a-2: / ye shes padma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan pa //
T02TD2688E:316a-3: tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02TD2688E:316a-4: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig / sems can rnams kyi don la thugs ni rab tu dgongs mdzad de ;
T02TD2688E:316a-5: /'gro ba mtha' dag 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa //
T02TD2688E:316a-6: thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02TD2688E:316a-7: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig / sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2688E:316a-8: gser gyi mdog can 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-9: chos dang dge 'dun lha dang lha min gyis bstod pa //
T02TD2688E:316a-10: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316a-11: bdud stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i bkra shis gang yin dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-12: rnam snang mdzad dang thams cad skyob dang rnam par gzigs //
T02TD2688E:316a-13: kun du mchod cing rgyas par gyur pa gzi chen mchog / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316a-14: padma'i bla dang sh'akya thub dang thub chen dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-15: ye shes dbang phyug spyan legs pa dang zla zhal dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-16: 'brug gi sgra dang rnga sgra lta bur dbyangs snyan pa //
T02TD2688E:316a-17: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316a-18: 'od zer rgyal mtshan dang ni gser thub 'od srungs dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-19: mar me mdzad dang shin tu brjid par gshegs pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-20: 'dren pa gtsug tor can dang 'od tog dpag med 'od //
T02TD2688E:316a-21: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316a-22: padma mdzes dang ye shes stobs dang zla 'od dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-23: nyi ma'i zhal dang dgra las rgyal dang bltams pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-24: yon tan 'byung gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid 'jig rten gtso //
T02TD2688E:316a-25: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316a-26: mi 'khrugs pa ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-27: 'dren pa mchog sbyin rin chen tog tu byas pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316a-28: rnam par sel dang lag na rin chen rgyal po mchog / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316a-29: 'jig rten dbang phyug rtag tu rgyal dbang gtsug tor can //
T02TD2688E:316a-30: ston zla dri med lta bur zhal ras mdzes pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-0: nam mkha'i snying po dang ni @316b sa yi snying po dag / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-1: 'jam dpal gtsug phud shin tu mdzes par rab brgyan pa //
T02TD2688E:316b-2: gzhon nu'i gzugs ni gser mchog 'od dang ldan pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-3: rtag tu rgyal bar dka' ba lag na rdo rje dpal //
T02TD2688E:316b-4: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-5: byams pa shin tu rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mnga' ba //
T02TD2688E:316b-6: lcang lo 'khril mnga' mchod rten gtsug tor gnas pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-7: kun du bzang dang nor bzangs dang ni sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02TD2688E:316b-8: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-9: skul byed ma dang sgrol ma khro gnyer 'gro phan dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-10: de bzhin shes rab la sogs pha rol phyin drug dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-11: rma bya dang ni 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub dag / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-12: gtsug tor las byung gsang sngags rjes 'dzin bcas pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-13: phyir bzlog ma dang bsil ba'i tshal ni rgyal las 'khrungs //
T02TD2688E:316b-14: lha mo ri khrod lo ma can dang bcas pa rnams //
T02TD2688E:316b-15: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-16: don yod grub dang stong chen rab tu 'joms ma dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-17: grong khyer w'a r'a na s'i zhes byar grags pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-18: bad sa'i snying po gcig dang ku sha'i gyad ldan pa //
T02TD2688E:316b-19: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-20: rdo rje lcags kyu dang ni gtsug 'phyang 'od po che //
T02TD2688E:316b-21: de bzhin bgegs 'joms 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-22: zla 'od de yang gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan pa ni //
T02TD2688E:316b-23: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-24: gshin rje gshed po 'jigs kun rab tu 'joms mdzad dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-25: padma mthar byed gnod mdzes de bzhin 'khor lo can //
T02TD2688E:316b-26: gzhan gyis mi thub dbyug sngon bsnams par mdzad pa dag / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-27: 'phags pa mi g-yo bgegs rigs rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-28: phun sum tshogs byed rmugs 'dzin autpala mdog can dang //
T02TD2688E:316b-29: glang chen ko rlon stag lpags dag gis brgyan gyur pa //
T02TD2688E:316b-30: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:316b-31: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang moo dgal 'od srungs dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-0: @317a * // nor bu 'dzin dang ma 'gags nye ba 'khor dang bcas //
T02TD2688E:317a-1: rab 'byor dang ni lus 'phags ri bo kun dga' bo //
T02TD2688E:317a-2: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-3: stobs chen bgegs kyi rigs ni rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-4: 'od zer ldan dang cha byad rab tu 'tsher ba dang ;
T02TD2688E:317a-5: / dug sel sprul gdug rab tu rgyags pa 'jig byed pa //
T02TD2688E:317a-6: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-7: 'phrog ma rna cha rnam pa sna tshogs g-yo 'gul ba //
T02TD2688E:317a-8: bu pho lnga brgya dag gis brgyan par gyur de dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-9: gnod sbyin bdag po lnga rtsen dang ni padma'i mig / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-10: ha la ha la sems can kun la phan mdzad dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-11: rin chen sgrol mar grags dang nor gyi rgyun mchog dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-12: gnod sbyin bdag po rnam thos sras po'i dpal thob pa //
T02TD2688E:317a-13: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-14: thams cad sgrol ba sbyin phod dam pa gzi chen dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-15: byams pa'i stobs ni gtong ba'i stobs chen ldan pa dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-16: sprin gyi tog dang ldan pa'i bu ni gang yin pa //
T02TD2688E:317a-17: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-18: rab tu dga' ba la sogs sa bcu de dag dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-19: dpa' bas byin pa de dang gtsug na nor bu dang ;
T02TD2688E:317a-20: / rgyal po dam pa zas gtsang dang ni ka pi na //
T02TD2688E:317a-21: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-22: lumba'i tshal ni bung ba lang long 'phur lding zhing //
T02TD2688E:317a-23: me tog 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2688E:317a-24: rma bya dang ni khu byug mang po'i sgra 'byin pa //
T02TD2688E:317a-25: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-26: btsun mo sgyu 'phrul dang ni de bzhin goo ta mi //
T02TD2688E:317a-27: sh'akya'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo grags 'dzin dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-28: nee ranydza na bsod nams ldan pa 'bab chur bcas //
T02TD2688E:317a-29: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-30: 'jig rten dbang phyug padma bung ba'i khyu lding dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-31: 'jam dpal autpala sngon po yid du 'ong ba dang //
T02TD2688E:317a-32: mgon po byams pa yi ni klu shing me tog bsnams //
T02TD2688E:317a-33: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317a-34: don yod grub pas legs bsnams ral gri mchog dang ni //
T02TD2688E:317a-35: mi bskyod rdo rje'i rdo rje nyid dang gzhan yang ni //
T02TD2688E:317b-0: skyob pa thams @317b cad kyi ni phyag mtshan ma lus pa //
T02TD2688E:317b-1: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317b-2: yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-3: dpag bsam gyi ni shing dang bum pa bzang po dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-4: rgyal ba kun gyis nges par bstan pa'i byang chub shing //
T02TD2688E:317b-5: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02TD2688E:317b-6: lam 'jug dus dang nor dang 'bru rnams sdud pa dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-7: nang par dus sam yang na zhi ba'i las byed tshe //
T02TD2688E:317b-8: dga' ston kun na 'jug dang dgos pa sgrub pa dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-9: ming mtshan 'di dag mi yis rab tu bsgrims te nyon //
T02TD2688E:317b-10: rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi mtshan 'di ma lus par //
T02TD2688E:317b-11: lha la gus bzhin nyin cig bzhin du nang par su brjod pa //
T02TD2688E:317b-12: de ni dmyal ba yi dags gnas su mi skye nad med cing //
T02TD2688E:317b-13: dpal dang bsod nams nor dang bkra shis rnam par 'phel //
T02TD2688E:317b-14: che ba'i che mchog dkon mchog bla na med //
T02TD2688E:317b-15: chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis ;
T02TD2688E:317b-16: / bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste //
T02TD2688E:317b-17: rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /'byung po gang dag deng 'dir lhags gyur te //
T02TD2688E:317b-18: sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag / skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing /
T02TD2688E:317b-19: nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog / rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2688E:317b-20: bden pa 'di gsungs de la sdig med cing //
T02TD2688E:317b-21: lhar bcas lha min gyis rtag mchod 'os pa'i //
T02TD2688E:317b-22: bden pa 'di sa ni deng 'dir bde legs shog / phyogs bzhi nas snyan pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:317b-24: aom bde gshegs rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs //
T02TD2688E:317b-25: rin chen padmo las kyi rigs //
T02TD2688E:317b-26: sna tshogs rigs kyi rgyal ba dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-27: rdzas kyi tshogs rnams bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2688E:317b-28: thog med las kyi srid rgyun nas //
T02TD2688E:317b-29: bsags pa'i dge ba ci snyed dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-30: gzungs sngags 'di yi mthu dang ni //
T02TD2688E:317b-31: rig sngags phyag rgya'i bden pa dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-32: gsang sngags 'di yi byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2688E:317b-33: zag med ye shes snang ba'i rgyan //
T02TD2688E:317b-34: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ste //
T02TD2688E:317b-35: myur ba nyid du skye bar shog / mig dang rna ba'i mngon shes dang //
T02TD2688E:317b-36: gzhan gyi sems don shes pa dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-2: rdzu 'phrul du ma bsgyur ba yang //
T02TD2688E:318a-3: da lta nyid du thob par shog / chu stengs 'gro dang rigs myur phyin //
T02TD2688E:318a-4: mig sman bum pa gter dang ni //
T02TD2688E:318a-5: ral gri bzung nas mkha' la 'gro //
T02TD2688E:318a-6: mi snang bsgyur lus thob par shog / sa 'og 'gro dang gter mthong dang ;
T02TD2688E:318a-7: / bcud rnams rnyed cing ring 'tsho dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-8: gzhan lus dbang po bsgyur ba dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-9: mdog bzang na rga med thob shog / zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyis //
T02TD2688E:318a-11: rang rang skal ba ji bzhin du //
T02TD2688E:318a-12: thogs pa med par byed par shog / gal te le lo'i rkyen gyis gol gyur nas //
T02TD2688E:318a-13: 'bras bu dam pa myur du ma rnyed kyang //
T02TD2688E:318a-14: bde 'gro mtho ris lha dbang dam pa dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-15: chos ldan yul dbus mi lus thob par shog / de nas bla med byang chub ma thob par //
T02TD2688E:318a-16: las kyi 'khor los srid gsum gar skyes kyang //
T02TD2688E:318a-17: lus dang srog ni yal bar gyur kyang rung //
T02TD2688E:318a-18: bla med byang chub sems ni mi gtong shog / bla med byang chub ma thob par du ni //
T02TD2688E:318a-19: lus dang srog la chags pa med par yang //
T02TD2688E:318a-20: bag yod mgo la me 'bar ji bzhin du //
T02TD2688E:318a-21: brtson 'grus chen po rgyun mi 'chad par shog / bdag dang gzhan don byang chub sgrub pa la //
T02TD2688E:318a-22: bar chad med cing brtson pa ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2688E:318a-23: 'jig rten dag na sems ni skad cig kyang //
T02TD2688E:318a-24: bdag gis don med g-yeng bar ma gyur cig / tshe rabs kun du dam chos spyod pa la //
T02TD2688E:318a-25: mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur cig / tshe la nad kyi bar chad med pa dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-26: skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad par shog //
T02TD2688E:318a-27: dge bshes dam pa rnams dang mi 'bral zhing //
T02TD2688E:318a-28: rnal 'byor brtson pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-29: skyon bral sems dang spyod pa mthun pa yis //
T02TD2688E:318a-30: 'jig rten dman pa'i gnas la chags ma gyur //
T02TD2688E:318a-31: byang chub rang bzhin byang chub thob pa'i rgyu //
T02TD2688E:318a-32: shes rab che dang snying rje che la sogs //
T02TD2688E:318a-33: bdag cag tshe rabs kun du mi 'bral zhing //
T02TD2688E:318a-34: rnam thar mang po'i sgor ni 'jug par shog / rgyal srid mtho ris sdug dang gnyen bshes dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-35: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad dang //
T02TD2688E:318a-36: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2688E:318b-0: shes @318b rab mchog gis gang la'ang chags ma gyur //
T02TD2688E:318b-1: gzhan don 'khor pa rnams su spyod pa na //
T02TD2688E:318b-2: bsdu ba'i dngos dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02TD2688E:318b-3: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD2688E:318b-4: 'gro ba rnams su byang chub spyod par shog / de bzhin du gzhan yang smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-5: de ni dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-6: de nas mchod rten yang dang yang du dri zhim po'i chu ba'i lcib dang bcas pas byugs te //
T02TD2688E:318b-7: sngon ltar thig btab la lha'i pho brang thams cad dang sgo la sogs pa thams cad kyi ris su bris nas padma dang zla ba'i steng du me tog tshom bu lha grangs su bzhag nas /
T02TD2688E:318b-8: zhing khams bye ba phrag brgya dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa brjod kyis mi lang bar khengs par bsams nas tsha tsha re re zhing dkyil 'khor re re ru bsams nas /
T02TD2688E:318b-9: tshom bu lha grangs su bzhag nas brgya'am /
T02TD2688E:318b-10: stong ngam khri'am 'bum mam sa ya'i bar du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-11: mchod rten gcig gi nang du bye ba las lhag par gzhug par me bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-12: de nas sku gdung gi nang gi khri'am /
T02TD2688E:318b-14: sgo thams cad bcad nas legs par zhal byug bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-15: 'di ni tsha tsha gzhug pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-16: de'i 'og tu mchod rten gyi ngos thams cad du thur ma mang du btsugs nas de la me tog phreng ba dang ba dan la sogs pas phreng ba'i tshul du brgyan par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-17: mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi byas te /
T02TD2688E:318b-18: yon chab la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag dngos su bshams pa dang /
T02TD2688E:318b-19: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs dang nor bu dang 'khor lo dang rta dang glang po che dang ;
T02TD2688E:318b-22: dmag mi la sogs pa ni bcos pa'i tshul du byas nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang sngags su bcas pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-23: phyogs bzhir mdo bzhi bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-24: de'i 'og tu snying po nyi tshe brjod cing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste /
T02TD2688E:318b-25: bkra shis brjod la smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:318b-26: de yang mchod rten ni mchod rten chen po rin po che'i snying po nam mkha' ma lus pa khyab pa kha dog sna tshogs pa gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rin po che du ma las grub pa 'od kyi snang ba dang ldan pa bsam mo //
T02TD2688E:319a-0: tsha tsha re re yang gzhal yas khang re rer @319a * //
T02TD2688E:319a-1: bsams te bum pa'i nang du ji ltar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang grangs mnyam par bsams nas khrus byas nas rang bzhin gyi lha dang gnyis su med par byas nas na bza' dang rgyan phreng la sogs pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-2: de ni mchod rten mchod pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-3: mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:319a-4: bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tshig 'di ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rmi lam lta bur kun du shes so zhes bya ba'i tshig dang 'brel te rmi lam du byung ba ni rjes su spyod pa'i rtags te /
T02TD2688E:319a-5: las dang po bsam du brjod na sngags kyi mthu bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa rmi lam du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-6: tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur pa'i rtags so //
T02TD2688E:319a-7: de la mchod rten 'bar ba ni sngags dang rdzas kyi mthus drod thob pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-8: bdag 'bar ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus //
T02TD2688E:319a-9: rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-10: de la rtags kyi rim pa ni gang yang gzungs kyi cho ga la 'jug pa'am zhugs pa'i tshe rmi lam du yid du 'ong ba'i tshal dang /
T02TD2688E:319a-14: dge 'dun la sogs pa lhan cig dga' ba'am /
T02TD2688E:319a-17: khri la sogs pa'i steng du gnas pa'am /
T02TD2688E:319a-18: gru'am zam gzings la sogs pa bsgral bar smin 'dod pa 'grub po //
T02TD2688E:319a-20: khrus byas pa la sogs pa rmi na sdig pa zad do //
T02TD2688E:319a-21: mchod rten nam tsha tsha la dri zhim po bro na lha gnas drug tu skye bar nges so //
T02TD2688E:319a-22: gal te dri cung zad bro ba yang longs spyod dang ldan pa'i mir skye'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-23: sgra grag na gzugs khams kyi lhar skye'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-24: 'od byung na rig 'dzin mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:319a-25: de dang de la sogs pa yon tan mtha' yas te sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2688E:319a-26: gang 'jig rten 'dir thob par 'gyur ba'i yon tan rnams ni rdzas dang yo byad tshang zhing ma nyams pa dang /
T02TD2688E:319a-29: tshul bsdams pas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:319a-30: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'bras bu bzang po ji snyed pa ni dad pa dang /
T02TD2688E:319a-31: snying rje mchog dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2688E:319b-0: lhag pa'i shes rab @319b kyis thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2688E:319b-1: de ni ltas kyi rim pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-2: nges par 'phral du la sogs pa ni phan par gsungs so //
T02TD2688E:319b-3: nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las grub na gzhan gyi don spyod pa la thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-4: sa bcu la gnas pa ni ral gri la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas brgyad thob pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-5: lung bstan pa thob pa ni mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i sku thob pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-7: da ni sngon byung rjes 'jug gnyis pos mtshams sbyar bas gzhung bsdu ba ni de nas la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:319b-8: mthu chen po ni gong du gsungs pa'i phan yon thams cad bskyed pa la gdon mi za ba'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-9: yon tan grangs med pa'i 'byung khungs yin pa'i phyir dpe nor bu rin po che lta bu'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-10: nyan thos la sogs pas mthong bar dka' ba 'di'i don gyi sgra dang tshad ma'i spyod yul ma yin pas thob par dka' ba'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-11: gzung bar bgyi'o zhes pa ni bstan pa'i don la nus pa med pa'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-12: rgyas par bgyi'o zhes pas sngags kyi ngo bo bzung ste skye ba med na 'gag pa gtan med /
T02TD2688E:319b-13: ma 'gags pa'i chos la dbang po rab 'bring thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par longs spyod par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-14: sems can thams cad la bsgrag par bgyi'o zhes pa ni /
T02TD2688E:319b-15: snod du ma gyur pa gang yang med ces bya ba'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-16: dper na gla rtsi bcug pa'i snod dri zhim por 'gyur ba ltar sngags 'chad pa po yang bying yi rlabs kyi sgo du ma dang ldan par 'gyur bas sems can chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-17: phyi bzhin 'brang zhes pa ni dper na mi'i mig gang gi spyod yul la srin bu la sogs pa la rgyang ring ngo //
T02TD2688E:319b-18: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul du khams gsum thams cad la nye ba dang ring ba mi mnga'o //
T02TD2688E:319b-19: bsrung ba dang ni gnas dang lus dang longs spyod do //
T02TD2688E:319b-20: bskyab pa ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las so //
T02TD2688E:319b-21: sba ba ni bdud kyi 'ching ba las so //
T02TD2688E:319b-22: bskyang ba ni lam log pa las so //
T02TD2688E:319b-23: bu bzhin zhes pa ni tshad med pas gzigs pa rgyun mi gcod pa'o //
T02TD2688E:320a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la sogs pa ni @320a * //
T02TD2688E:320a-1: dam bca' rjes su gdams pa gsungs te /
T02TD2688E:320a-2: phyag na rdo rje yang bdag ltar 'gro ba la dgongs pa'i phyir grogs po zhes bos so //
T02TD2688E:320a-3: legs so dang pos ni kun rdzob tu tha dad par mkhyen pa ste chos 'dzin pa ni bskyang ba legs so //
T02TD2688E:320a-4: legs so gnyis pa ni don dam par tha mi dad par mkhyen pa ste chos bskyang ba legs so //
T02TD2688E:320a-5: khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig ces pa ni rang don rdzogs par mdzad ces pa'o //
T02TD2688E:320a-6: ngas khyed la gtad do zhes pas gzhan don yang rdzogs par gyis shig ces pa'o //
T02TD2688E:320a-7: dper na phas bu la nor gad pa yang tsha bo la sogs pa phyis 'byung ba'i gzhi shugs kyis 'byung ba dang 'dra bar gang zag snod ldan rnams byin gyis rlobs la brgyud pa rgyun ma chad par mdzod ces pa'i don to //
T02TD2688E:320a-8: phan yon la sogs pa gang brda phrad par sla ba ni ma bkral lo //
T02TD2688E:320a-9: sgrib pa rnam sel la sogs pa //
T02TD2688E:320a-10: sems dpa' bcu drug rtog pa dang //
T02TD2688E:320a-12: rig pa'i lha mo'i rgyud rnams dang //
T02TD2688E:320a-13: kri ya'i rigs bsdus la sogs pa dang //
T02TD2688E:320a-14: rnal 'byor pa mchog la sogs dang //
T02TD2688E:320a-15: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs dang //
T02TD2688E:320a-16: gzungs 'di'i cho ga rgyas gsungs kyang //
T02TD2688E:320a-17: le lo can rnams spro bskyed /
T02TD2688E:320a-19: / shin tu bsdus nas bshad pa la //
T02TD2688E:320a-20: tshul bzhin gzhung nas gsungs pa ltar //
T02TD2688E:320a-21: phan yon thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2688E:320a-22: gang gi lcags kyu bzung nas nya ra yis //
T02TD2688E:320a-23: klu yi phyugs rnams 'bum phrag bton pa ltar //
T02TD2688E:320a-24: bdag dge kun slong 'gro rnams byang chub kyi //
T02TD2688E:320a-25: rin chen gling thob mdzad phyir bris pa las //
T02TD2688E:320a-26: skye 'gyur dge bas gzungs don la 'jug cing //
T02TD2688E:320a-27: 'gro kun dri med yid bzhin nor thob shog / kun nas skor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba /
T02TD2688E:320a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /
T02TD2688E:320a-29: dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa /
T02TD2688E:320a-30: slob dpon chen po dngos grub thob pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2688E:320a-32: // / gsangs sngags rig 'dzin sde snod la //
T02TD2688E:320a-33: mkha' ltar shes rab dang ba ni //
T02TD2688E:320a-34: nyi ma lta bur ma rmongs pa'i //
T02TD2688E:320b-0: @320b mkhas pa dza ya de pa la //
T02TD2688E:320b-1: lang so bande tshul brtsegs kyis //
T02TD2688E:320b-2: gus bcas mang du gsol btab nas //
T02TD2688E:320b-3: spu rgyal bod las khyad par du //
T02TD2688E:320b-4: nad med sa gtsang mdo khams su //
T02TD2688E:320b-5: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i gzungs mchog gi /
T02TD2688E:320b-7: bsgyur ba'i dge bas dad ldan rnams //
T02TD2688E:320b-8: gzungs 'di rgya cher spyod par shog //
T02TD2688E:320b-9: / pandi ta dza ya de ba dang //
T02TD2688E:320b-10: lo ts'a ba lang so bande tshul khrims brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o//
